  8423                                  
  8424                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8425                                  
  8426                                  ;************************************************************************
  8427                                  ;*									*
  8428                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8429                                  ;*									*
  8430                                  ;************************************************************************
  8431                                  
  8432                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8433                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8434 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8435                                  con_loop:				
  8436 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8437 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8438 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8439                                  con_exit:				
  8440 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8441 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8442                                  
  8443                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8444                                  
  8445                                  ;************************************************************************
  8446                                  ;*									*
  8447                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8448                                  ;*									*
  8449                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8450                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8451                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8452                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8453                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8454                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8455                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8456                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8457                                  ;*									*
  8458                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8459                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8460                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8461                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8462                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8463                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8464                                  ;*									*
  8465                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8466                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8467                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8468                                  ;*									*
  8469                                  ;************************************************************************
  8470                                  
  8471                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8472                                  chrin:		
  8473 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8474 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8475 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8476 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8477 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8478 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8479 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8480 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8481 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8482 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8483 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8484 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8485                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8486                                  
  8487                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8488                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8489                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8490                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8491                                  ;      else
  8492                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8493                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8494                                  ;      endif
  8495                                  ;    endif
  8496                                  ;  endif
  8497                                  
  8498                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8499 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8500 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8501 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8502 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8503 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8504 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8505 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8506 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8507                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8508                                  
  8509                                  not_ext:				
  8510 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8511 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8512                                  alt_save:				
  8513 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8514                                  keyret:					
  8515 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8516                                  
  8517                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8518                                  
  8519                                  ;************************************************************************
  8520                                  ;*									*
  8521                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8522                                  ;*									*
  8523                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8524                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8525                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8526                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8527                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8528                                  ;*									*
  8529                                  ;************************************************************************
  8530                                  
  8531                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8532                                  con_rdnd:				
  8533 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8534 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8535 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8536 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8537 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8538 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8539 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8540 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8541 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8542                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8543 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8544                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8545 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8546 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8547 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8548 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8549                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8550                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8551                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8552                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8553 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8554 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8555 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8557                                  
  8558                                  gotchr:					
  8559 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8560 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8561 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8562 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8563 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8564                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8565                                  
  8566                                  notbrk:					
  8567 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8568 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8569 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8570 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8572                                  
  8573                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8574 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8575 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8576 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8577 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8578 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8579 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8580 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8581                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8582                                  rdexit:					
  8583 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8584 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8585                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8586                                  bc_exvec:				
  8587 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8588                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8589 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8590                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8591                                  
  8592                                  ;************************************************************************
  8593                                  ;*									*
  8594                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8595                                  ;*									*
  8596                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8597                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8598                                  ;*									*
  8599                                  ;************************************************************************
  8600                                  
  8601                                  con_writ:
  8602                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8603 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8604                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8605                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8606                                  con_lp:					
  8607 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8608 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8609 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8610                                  					; AL = character to display
  8611 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8612                                  cc_ret:					
  8613 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8614 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8615                                  
  8616                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8617                                  
  8618                                  ;************************************************************************
  8619                                  ;*									*
  8620                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8621                                  ;*									*
  8622                                  ;************************************************************************
  8623                                  
  8624                                  con_flush:
  8625 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8626                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8627 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8628 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8629                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8630                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8631                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8632 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8633 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8634 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8635                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8636 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8637                                  
  8638                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8639                                  
  8640                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8641                                  
  8642                                  ;************************************************************************
  8643                                  ;*									*
  8644                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8645                                  ;*									*
  8646                                  ;************************************************************************
  8647                                  
  8648                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8649                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8650                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8651                                  
  8652                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8653                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8654                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8655                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8656                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8657                                  ;
  8658                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8659                                  
  8660                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8661                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8662                                  
  8663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8664                                  
  8665                                  ;************************************************************************
  8666                                  ;*									*
  8667                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8668                                  ;*									*
  8669                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8670                                  ;*									*
  8671                                  ;************************************************************************
  8672                                  
  8673                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8674 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8675                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8676                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8677                                  prn_done:
  8678 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8679 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8681                                  
  8682                                  ;************************************************************************
  8683                                  ;*									*
  8684                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8685                                  ;*									*
  8686                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8687                                  ;*									*
  8688                                  ;************************************************************************
  8689                                  
  8690                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8691                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8692 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8693                                  prn_loop:				
  8694 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8695                                  prn_out:				
  8696 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8697 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8698 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8699 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8700 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8701 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8702 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8703 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8704 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8705 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8706 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8707                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8708                                  
  8709                                  _prnwf:					
  8710 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8711 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8712                                  TestPrnError:				
  8713 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8714 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8715                                  pmessg:					
  8716 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8718                                  
  8719                                  prn_con:				
  8720 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8721 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8722                                  ;prn_done:				
  8723                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8724                                  prn_done2:
  8725                                  		;clc
  8726                                  		; cf=0
  8727 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8729                                  
  8730                                  ;************************************************************************
  8731                                  ;*									*
  8732                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8733                                  ;*									*
  8734                                  ;************************************************************************
  8735                                  
  8736                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8737 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8738 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8739 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8740                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8741                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8742 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8743 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8744                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8745                                  
  8746                                  ;************************************************************************
  8747                                  ;*									*
  8748                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8749                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;************************************************************************
  8752                                  
  8753                                  prnstat:				
  8754 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8755                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8756                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8757                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8758                                  
  8759                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8760                                  
  8761                                  ;************************************************************************
  8762                                  ;*									*
  8763                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8764                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8765                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8766                                  ;*									*
  8767                                  ;************************************************************************
  8768                                  
  8769                                  prnop:	
  8770 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8771 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8772                                  
  8773                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8774                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8775                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8776                                  
  8777 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8778 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8779 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8780 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8781 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8782 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8783 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8784                                  
  8785                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8786                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8787                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8788                                  
  8789                                  NextTest:				
  8790 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8791                                  					; i/o error?
  8792 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8793                                  
  8794                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8795                                  
  8796 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8797                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8798 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8799 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8800 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8801                                  ret1:					
  8802 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8803                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8804                                  
  8805                                  checknotready:				
  8806 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8807 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8808 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8809                                  
  8810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8811                                  
  8812                                  ;************************************************************************
  8813                                  ;*									*
  8814                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8815                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8816                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8817                                  ;*									*
  8818                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8819                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8820                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8821                                  ;*									*
  8822                                  ;************************************************************************
  8823                                  
  8824                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8825                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8826 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8827                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8828 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8829 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8830 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8831 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8832 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8833                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8834 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8835 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8836                                  prn_getstat:				
  8837 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8838 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8839 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8840 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8841 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8842 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8843 000002A6 26                      		es
  8844 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8845                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8846                                  					; lodsb
  8847 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8848 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8849 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8850 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8851                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8852                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8853                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8854 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8857                                  
  8858                                  prn_bperr:				
  8859 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8860                                  prn_berr:				
  8861 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8862                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8865                                  
  8866                                  ;************************************************************************
  8867                                  ;*									*
  8868                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8869                                  ;*									*
  8870                                  ;************************************************************************
  8871                                  
  8872                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8873                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8874                                  
  8875                                  ;********************************;*
  8876                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8877                                  ;********************************;*
  8878                                  
  8879                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8880                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8881                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8882                                  
  8883                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8884                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8885                                  ;;endstruc
  8886                                  
  8887                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8888                                  
  8889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8890                                  
  8891                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8892                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8893 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8894 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8895                                  					; ioc_pc
  8896 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8897                                  
  8898                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8899 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8900                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8901                                  
  8902                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8903 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8904 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8905 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8906                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8907 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8908 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8909                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8910 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8911 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8912 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8913 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8914 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8915 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8916                                  prngetcount:				
  8917                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8918 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8919 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8920                                  					; return current retry count
  8921                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8922                                  		; cf=0
  8923                                  		;clc
  8924 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8925                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8926                                  
  8927                                  ;************************************************************************
  8928                                  ;*									*
  8929                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8930                                  ;*									*
  8931                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8932                                  ;************************************************************************
  8933                                  
  8934                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8935 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8936 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8937                                  					; ioc_pc
  8938 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8939 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8940 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8941 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8942 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8943 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8944                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8945                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8946                                  		; cf=0		
  8947                                  		;clc
  8948 00000302 C3                      		retn
  8949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8950                                  
  8951                                  prn_query_err:
  8952                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8953                                  		;stc
  8954 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8955                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8956                                  
  8957                                  ;************************************************************************
  8958                                  ;*									*
  8959                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8960                                  ;*									*
  8961                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8962                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8963                                  ;*									*
  8964                                  ;************************************************************************
  8965                                  
  8966                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8967                                  
  8968                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8969                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8970                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8971                                  
  8972                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8973                                  
  8974                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8975                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8976                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8977                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8978                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8979                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8980                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8981                                  
  8982                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8983                                  
  8984                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8985                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8986                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8987                                  
  8988                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8989                                  
  8990                                  ;************************************************************************
  8991                                  ;*									*
  8992                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8993                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8994                                  ;*									*
  8995                                  ;************************************************************************
  8996                                  
  8997                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8998                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8999 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9000 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9001 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9002 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9003 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9004 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9005                                  aux1:					
  9006 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9007                                  					; won't return if error
  9008                                  aux2:					
  9009 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  9010 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9011                                  exvec2:

  9013                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9014 0000031A C3                      		retn

  9016                                  
  9017                                  ;************************************************************************
  9018                                  ;*									*
  9019                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9020                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9021                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9022                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9023                                  ;*									*
  9024                                  ;************************************************************************
  9025                                  
  9026                                  auxin:					
  9027 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9028 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  9029 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9030                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9031                                  		;retn
  9032                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9033 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9035                                  
  9036                                  arbad:					
  9037 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9038 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9039 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9040 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9041                                  
  9042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9043                                  
  9044                                  ;************************************************************************
  9045                                  ;*									*
  9046                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9047                                  ;*									*
  9048                                  ;************************************************************************
  9049                                  
  9050                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  9054 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9055 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9056 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9057 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9058 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9059 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9060 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9061 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9062                                  auxdrx:

  9064                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9065                                  
  9066                                  auxbus:

  9068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9069                                  
  9070                                  ;************************************************************************
  9071                                  ;*									*

  9079 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9080 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9081 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9082                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9083                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9084                                  		;clc
  9085 00000359 C3                      		retn
  9086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9087                                  
  9088                                  ;************************************************************************
  9089                                  ;*									*
  9090                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9091                                  ;*									*
  9092                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9093                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9094                                  ;*									*
  9095                                  ;************************************************************************
  9096                                  
  9097                                  auxstat:				
  9098 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9099                                  
  9100                                  		; fall into auxop
  9101                                  
  9102                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9103                                  
  9104                                  ;************************************************************************
  9105                                  ;*									*
  9106                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9107                                  ;*									*
  9108                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9109                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9110                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9111                                  ;*									*
  9112                                  ;************************************************************************
  9113                                  
  9114                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9115 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9116                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9117                                  					; get port number
  9118 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9119                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9120                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9121 00000362 C3                      		retn
  9122                                  
  9123                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9124                                  
  9125                                  ;************************************************************************
  9126                                  ;*									*
  9127                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9128                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9129                                  ;*									*
  9130                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9131                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9132                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9133                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9134                                  ;*									*
  9135                                  ;************************************************************************
  9136                                  
  9137                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9138 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9139 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9140                                  					; zero out buffer
  9141                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9142                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9143                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9144 00000369 C3                      		retn
  9145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9146                                  
  9147                                  ;************************************************************************
  9148                                  ;*									*
  9149                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9150                                  ;*									*
  9151                                  ;************************************************************************
  9152                                  
  9153                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9154                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9155 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9156                                  aux_loop:				
  9157 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9158                                  					; move di pointer to next character

  9160 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9161 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9162 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9163 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9164 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9165 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9166                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9167                                  
  9168                                  awok:					
  9169 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9170                                  					; still	more character to print
  9171                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9172                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9173                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9174 00000381 C3                      		retn
  9175                                  
  9176                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9177                                  
  9178                                  ;************************************************************************
  9179                                  ;*									*
  9180                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9181                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9182                                  ;*									*
  9183                                  ;************************************************************************
  9184                                  
  9185                                  getbx:	
  9186 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9187                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9188                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9189 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9190                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9191                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9192 0000038A C3                      		retn
  9193

  9195                                  
  9196                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9197                                  
  9198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9199                                  ;								:
  9200                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9201                                  ;								:
  9202                                  ;								:
  9203                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9204                                  ;								:
  9205                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9206                                  ;								:
  9207                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9208                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9209                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9210                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9211                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9212                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9213                                  ;								:
  9214                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9215                                  ;								:
  9216                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9217                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9218                                  ;								:
  9219                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9220                                  
  9221                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9222                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9223                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9224                                  
  9225                                  ;19/07/2019
  9226                                  ;09/03/2019
  9227                                  
  9228                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9229                                  
  9230                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9231                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9232                                  
  9233 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9234 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9235 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9236 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9237 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9238 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9239 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9240 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9241 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9242 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9243 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9244 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9245 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9246 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9247 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9248                                  
  9249                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9250                                  
  9251 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9252 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9253 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9254 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9255 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9256 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9257 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9258 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9259 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9260 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9261 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9262 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9263 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9264 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9265 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9266 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  9267 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9268 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9269 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9270 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  9271                                  
  9272                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9273                                  
  9274                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9275                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9276                                  
  9277                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9278                                  ;
  9279                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9280                                  ;
  9281                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9282                                  ;
  9283                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9284                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9285                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9286                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9287                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9288                                  ;
  9289                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9290                                  ;
  9291                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9292                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9293                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9294                                  ;
  9295                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9296                                  
  9297                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9298 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9299 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9300                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9301 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9302                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9303 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9304 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9305                                  					; get binary hours
  9306                                  					; convert to bcd
  9307 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9308                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9309 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9310 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9311 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9312                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9313 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9314 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9315 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9316                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  9317 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9318 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9319 000003FB FA                      		cli
  9320 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9321 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9322                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9323                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9324                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9325 00000400 FB                      		sti
  9326                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9327 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9328 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9329                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9330 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9331                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9332                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9333                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9334 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9335 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9336 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9337                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9338                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9339                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9340 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9341 00000416 FB                      		sti
  9342                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9343 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9344 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9345 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  9346                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9347                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9348 00000422 FA                      		cli
  9349 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9350 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9351                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9352                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9353                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9354 00000427 FB                      		sti
  9355                                  no_cmos_2:
  9356                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9357                                  		; cf=0				
  9358                                  		;clc
  9359 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9360                                  
  9361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9362                                  
  9363                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9364                                  
  9365                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9366                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9367                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9368                                  ;
  9369                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9370                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9371                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9372                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9373                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9374                                  ;
  9375                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9376                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9377                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9379                                  
  9380                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9381 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9382 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9383                                  
  9384                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9385                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9386                                  ;
  9387                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9388                                  ;	       ----------------
  9389                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9390                                  ;
  9391                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9392                                  ;
  9393                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9394                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9395                                  ;		1,193,180
  9396                                  ;
  9397                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9398                                  ;
  9399                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9400                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9401                                  ;		59,659
  9402                                  ;
  9403                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9404                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9405                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9406                                  ;
  9407                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9408                                  ; multiply by 5
  9409                                  
  9410 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9411 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9412                                  					; multiply by 5
  9413 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9414 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9415 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9416 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9417 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9418 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9419 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9420                                  
  9421                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9422                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9423                                  
  9424 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9425 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9426                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9427 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9428 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9429 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9430                                  
  9431                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9432                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9433                                  
  9434 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9435 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9436                                  
  9437                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9438                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9439                                  
  9440 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9441 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9442 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9443 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9444                                  noadj:					
  9445 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9446 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9447                                  
  9448                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9449                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9450                                  
  9451 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9452 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9453 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9454 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9455 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9456 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9457 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9458 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9459                                  
  9460                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9461                                  
  9462 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9463 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9464 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9465 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9466 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9467 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9468 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9469 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9470 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9471                                  
  9472                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9473                                  
  9474                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9475                                  
  9476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9477                                  ;
  9478                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9479                                  ;
  9480                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9481                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9482                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9483                                  ;
  9484                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9485                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9486                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9487                                  ;			else
  9488                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9489                                  ;		}
  9490                                  ;
  9491                                  ; USES : AX
  9492                                  ;
  9493                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9494                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9495                                  ;
  9496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9497                                  
  9498                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9499                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9500 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9501 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9502                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9503                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9504                                  					; midnight
  9505                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9506 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9507 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9508 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9509                                  					; and not flag
  9510 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9511 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9512                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9513                                  
  9514                                  inc_case:				
  9515 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9516 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9517 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9518                                  no_rollover:				
  9519 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9520                                  
  9521                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9522                                  ; MSDISK.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  9523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9525                                  ; 09/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9526                                  
  9527                                  ; MSDISK.ASM - MSDOS 3.3 - 02/02/1988
  9528                                  ; 26/05/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  9529                                  ; 23/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
  9530

  9532                                  
  9533                                  ;struc BPB_TYPE

  9539                                  ;.SECNUM:	resw 1
  9540                                  ;.FATID:	resb 1
