  9548                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9549                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9550                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9551                                  
  9552                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9553                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9554                                  
  9555                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9556                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9557                                  
  9558                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9559                                  
  9560                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9561                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9562                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9563                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9564                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9565                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9566                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9567                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9568                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9569                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9570                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9571                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9572                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9573                                  
  9574                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9575                                  
  9576                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9577                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9578                                  ;
  9579                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9580                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9581                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9582                                  ;   else
  9583                                  ;	set slow = value
  9584                                  ;   ...
  9585                                  ;*********************************************
  9586                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9587                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9588                                  ;*	 use slow
  9589                                  ;*   else
  9590                                  ;*	 use fast
  9591                                  ;*********************************************
  9592                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9593                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9594                                  ;	use slow
  9595                                  ;   else
  9596                                  ;	use fast
  9597                                  ;   ...
  9598                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9599                                  ;
  9600                                  ;
  9601                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9602                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9603                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9604                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9605                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9606                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9607                                  
  9608                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9609                                  
  9610                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9611                                  
  9612                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9613

  9615                                  ;	command jump table
  9616                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9617

  9619

  9621                                  %if 0
  9622                                  
  9623                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  9624                                  					; ((dtbl_siz-1)/2) ; this is the size of the table ; 26
  9625                                  		dw 1742h		; dsk_init

  9627                                  		dw 592h			; get_bpb

  9636                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9638                                  		dw 80Ah			; dsk_open
  9639                                  		dw 81Ah			; dsk_close

  9641                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear
  9642                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear
  9643                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9645                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear
  9646                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9657 00000497 [DF16]                  		dw dsk_init

  9660 0000049D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr

  9679 000004C3 [4B05]                  		dw ret_carry_clear

  9686                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9687                                  
  9688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9689                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9690                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9691                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9692                                  ;
  9693                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9695                                  
  9696                                  SetDrive:	
  9697                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9698 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9699                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9700 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9701 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9702 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9703 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9704 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9705 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9706                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9707 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9708                                  
  9709                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9710                                  
  9711                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9712                                  
  9713                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9714                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9715                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9716                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9717                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9719                                  
  9720                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9721 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9722 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9723 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9724                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9725 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9726                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9727 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9728                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9729                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9730 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9731                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9732 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9733                                  					; fnon_removable
  9734 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9735 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9736 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9738                                  
  9739                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9740                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9741 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9742 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9743                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9744 00000509 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; Presume "I don't know"
  9745                                  
  9746                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9747                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9748                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9749                                  
  9750 0000050B 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
  9751 00000510 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
  9752 00000512 E89512                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
  9753 00000515 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
  9754 00000517 E8ED13                  		call	haschange
  9755 0000051A 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9756                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
  9757                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
  9758                                  			
  9759 0000051C BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; Presume no change
  9760 0000051F A0[1E01]                		mov	al, [tim_drv]	; Last drive accessed
  9761 00000522 263A4504                		cmp	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9762                                  					; Is drive of last access the same?
  9763 00000526 7505                    		jnz	short Media_Unk	; No, then "i don't know"
  9764 00000528 E82800                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
  9765 0000052B EB01                    		jmp	short Media_Done
  9766                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9767                                  
  9768                                  Media_Unk:				
  9769 0000052D 4E                      		dec	si		; ; Return "I don't know"
  9770                                  
  9771                                  		; SI now contains the correct value for media change.
  9772                                  		; Clean up the left overs
  9773                                  Media_Done:	
  9774                                  		; 19/10/2022			
  9775 0000052E 06                      		push	es
  9776 0000052F C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9777 00000533 2689770E                		mov	[es:bx+0Eh], si	; [es:bx+trans]
  9778 00000537 07                      		pop	es
  9779 00000538 09F6                    		or	si, si
  9780 0000053A 790F                    		jns	short ret_carry_clear ;	volidok
  9781 0000053C 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
  9782 00000541 7403                    		jz	short mChk1_NoChangeLine ; Brif	no changeline support
  9783 00000543 E84D13                  		call	media_set_vid
  9784                                  mChk1_NoChangeLine:			
  9785 00000546 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9786                                  					; Make sure we ask rom for media check
  9787                                  ret_carry_clear:			
  9788 0000054B F8                      		clc			; volidok
  9789 0000054C C3                      		retn
  9790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9791                                  
  9792                                  err_exitj:				
  9793 0000054D E87D06                  		call	maperror	; guaranteed to	set carry
  9794                                  ret81:					
  9795 00000550 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; return error status
  9796 00000552 C3                      		retn			; return with carry set
  9797                                  
  9798                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9799                                  
  9800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9801                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9802                                  ; drive.
  9803                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9804                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9805                                  ; returns in si:
  9806                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9807                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9808                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9809                                  ;
  9810                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9812                                  
  9813                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9814                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9815 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9816 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9817 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9818                                  					; get stored time
  9819 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9820 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9821 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9822 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9823 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9824 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9825 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9826 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9827                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok

  9963                                  			; Microsoft/IBM code has a bug here because the BDS's

  9973                                  			; (after 'rep movsb') 'test al,fbig' (AL is free/proper to use here)

  9976                                  			; and in Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0E1Ah as 'test byte [es:di+59],20h'

  9982                                  			; when the flag bit has wrong value for FAT16/40h or FAT32/20h.)

 10006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10007                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
 10008                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
 10009                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
 10010                                  ;	    for all other cases,
 10011                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
 10012                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
 10013                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
 10014                                  ;
 10015                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
 10016                                  ;
 10017                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
 10018                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
 10019                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
 10020                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
 10021                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
 10022                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
 10023                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
 10024                                  ;
 10025                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
 10026                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
 10027                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
 10028                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10029                                  
 10030                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.

 10034                                  		;jmp	getret_exit

 10044                                  		; we assume that the 2.x and greater dos disks all
 10045                                  		; have a valid boot sector.

 10171                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10172                                  
 10173                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10174                                  
 10175                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10176                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 10177                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 10178                                  ;
 10179                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 10180                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10181                                  
 10182                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10183                                  
 10184                                  readbootsec:	
 10185 000006A9 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 10186 000006AB B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 10187 000006AE E8C600                  		call	read_sector
 10188 000006B1 724A                    		jb	short err_ret
 10189 000006B3 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10190                                  
 10191                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10192                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10193                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10194                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10195                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10196                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10197                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10198                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10199                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10200                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10201                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10202                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10203                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10204                                  		; informations
 10205                                  
 10206                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10207                                  
 10208                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10209 000006B5 803E[4E01]69            		cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10210 000006BA 7415                    		jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10211 000006BC 803E[4E01]E9            		cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10212 000006C1 740E                    		jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10213 000006C3 803E[4E01]EB            		cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10214 000006C8 7531                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10215 000006CA 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10216 000006CF 752A                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10217                                  
 10218                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10219                                  ;
 10220                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10221                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10222                                  ;;
 10223                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10224                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10225                                  ;;
 10226                                  ;;check_signature:
 10227                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10228                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10229                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if singled sided medium.
 10230                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10231                                  
 10232                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10233                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10234                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10235                                  
 10236                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10237                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10238 000006D1 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10239                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10240 000006D4 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10241 000006D6 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10242 000006D8 7521                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10243                                  
 10244                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10245                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10246                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10247                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10248                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10249                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10250                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10251                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10252                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10253                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10254                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10255                                  
 10256                                  checksinglesided:
 10257 000006DA A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10258 000006DD 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10259 000006DF 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10260 000006E1 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10261 000006E3 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10262 000006E5 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10263 000006EB 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10264 000006ED 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10265 000006F2 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10266                                  
 10267                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10268                                  
 10269                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10270 000006F4 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10271                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10272 000006F9 EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10274                                  
 10275                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10276 000006FB 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10277                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10278                                  movbpb_ret:
 10279                                  gooddsk:				
 10280 000006FC F8                      		clc
 10281                                  err_ret:
 10282 000006FD C3                      		retn
 10283                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10284                                  
 10285                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10286                                  ;err_ret:				
 10287                                  		;retn

 10289                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10290                                  
 10291                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10292                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10293                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10294                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10295                                  ;
 10296                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10297                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10298                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10299                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10300                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10301                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10303                                  
 10304                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10305                                  
 10306                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10307                                  movbpb:	
 10308 000006FE 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10309                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10310                                  					; sectors per unit
 10311 00000702 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10312                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10313                                  					; number of directory entries
 10314 00000706 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10315                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10316                                  					; size of drive
 10317 0000070A 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10318                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10319                                  					; media	descriptor
 10320 0000070E A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10321                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10322                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10323 00000711 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10324                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10325                                  					; sectors per track
 10326 00000715 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10327                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10328                                  					; number of heads
 10329 00000719 803E[0A05]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 10330 0000071E 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10331 00000720 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10332 00000723 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 10333 00000725 C606[0A05]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 10334                                  movbpb_conv:				
 10335 0000072A 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 10336 0000072F 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10337 00000731 E8CD11                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 10338                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10339                                  		; cf = 0
 10340                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 10341                                  		;clc
 10342 00000734 C3                      		retn
 10343                                  
 10344                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10345                                  
 10346                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10347                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10348                                  ;by es:di.
 10349                                  
 10350                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10351                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10352                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10353                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10354                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10355                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10356                                  
 10357                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10358                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10359 00000735 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10360                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10361                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10362 0000073A 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10363 0000073C 51                      		push	cx
 10364 0000073D 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10365                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10366 00000741 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10367 00000745 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10368                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10369 00000749 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10370 0000074D 57                      		push	di
 10371 0000074E 56                      		push	si
 10372 0000074F B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10373 00000752 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10374                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;

 10376 00000755 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10377 00000758 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10378                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10379                                  		; 10/12/2022

 10401                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10402                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10403                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10404                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10405                                  ; output:
 10406                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10407                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10408                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10409                                  
 10410                                  readfat:	
 10411                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10412                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10413 0000076A 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10414 0000076C B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10415                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10416 0000076F E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10417 00000772 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10418 00000774 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10419                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10420 00000776 C3                      		retn

 10422                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10423                                  
 10424                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10425                                  
 10426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10427                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10428                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10429                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10430                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10431                                  ;		dh has head
 10432                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10433                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10434                                  ;
 10435                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10436                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10437                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10438                                  ;
 10439                                  ;		carry set
 10440                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10441                                  ;
 10442                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10443                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10444                                  
 10445                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10446                                  
 10447                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10448                                  read_sector:	
 10449 00000777 55                      		push	bp
 10450 00000778 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10451 0000077B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10452 0000077F BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10453                                  rd_ret:					
 10454 00000782 06                      		push	es
 10455 00000783 1E                      		push	ds
 10456 00000784 07                      		pop	es
 10457 00000785 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10458 00000788 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10459                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10460                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10461                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10462 0000078A 07                      		pop	es
 10463 0000078B 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10464                                  rd_rty:					
 10465 0000078D E87504                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10466 00000790 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10467 00000792 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10468                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10469                                  					; fnon_removable
 10470 00000797 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10471 00000799 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10472 0000079E 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10473 000007A0 50                      		push	ax
 10474 000007A1 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10475 000007A2 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10476                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10477                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10478                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10479                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10480 000007A6 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10481 000007A8 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10482                                  		; 
 10483 000007AB 1F                      		pop	ds
 10484 000007AC A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10485 000007AF 58                      		pop	ax
 10486                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10487 000007B0 06                      		push	es
 10488 000007B1 1E                      		push	ds
 10489 000007B2 07                      		pop	es
 10490 000007B3 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10491 000007B6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10492                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10493                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10494                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10495 000007B8 07                      		pop	es
 10496 000007B9 9C                      		pushf
 10497 000007BA 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10498 000007BF 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10499 000007C1 50                      		push	ax
 10500 000007C2 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10501 000007C5 1E                      		push	ds
 10502 000007C6 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10503 000007CA 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10504 000007CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 10505 000007CE 58                      		pop	ax
 10506                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10507 000007CF 9D                      		popf
 10508 000007D0 7305                    		jnb	short okret2

 10749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10750                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10751                                  ;
 10752                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10753                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10754                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10755                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10756                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10757                                  ;	ds = cs
 10758                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10759                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10760                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10761                                  ;
 10762                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10763                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10764                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 10766                                  diskrd:

 11096 00000A65 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 11097 00000A69 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 11098 00000A6D 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 11099                                  ;retry:
 11100                                  ; 09/12/2022
 11101                                  _retry:					
 11102 00000A71 50                      		push	ax
 11103 00000A72 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 11104 00000A76 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11105 00000A7B 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 11106 00000A7D 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 11107                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 11108 00000A82 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 11109 00000A84 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 11110                                  					; add hidden trks.
 11111                                  disk_not_mini:				
 11112 00000A88 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11113 00000A8A D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11114 00000A8C 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 11115 00000A90 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 11116 00000A92 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 11117 00000A94 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 11118 00000A98 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 11119                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11120 00000A9C 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 11121 00000AA1 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 11122                                  
 11123                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 11124                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 11125                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 11126                                  
 11127 00000AA3 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 11128 00000AA8 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 11129 00000AAA 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 11130 00000AAD 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 11131 00000AAF 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 11132 00000AB2 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 11133                                  do_writej:	
 11134                                  
 11135                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 11136                                  			
 11137 00000AB4 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 11138                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11139                                  
 11140                                  do_fast:				
 11141 00000AB6 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 11142                                  
 11143                                  testerr:				
 11144 00000AB9 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 11145                                  
 11146                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 11147                                  
 11148 00000ABB 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 11149 00000ABF 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11150                                  no_set:
 11151                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 11152 00000AC3 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 11153 00000AC9 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 11154                                  noverify:				
 11155 00000ACB 58                      		pop	ax
 11156                                  
 11157                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 11158                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 11159                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 11160                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 11161                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 11162                                  
 11163 00000ACC 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11164                                  					; fnon_removable
 11165 00000AD1 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 11166 00000AD3 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 11167 00000AD8 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 11168                                  its_removable:				
 11169 00000ADA 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 11170 00000ADD 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11171 00000ADF 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 11172 00000AE3 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 11173 00000AE5 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 11174 00000AE9 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11175                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 11176 00000AED 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 11177 00000AEF C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 11178 00000AF4 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 11179 00000AF8 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 11180 00000AFA 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 11181 00000AFE 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 11182 00000B00 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11183 00000B02 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11184                                  noxor:					
 11185 00000B06 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11186                                  disk_ret:				
 11187 00000B0A F8                      		clc
 11188 00000B0B C3                      		retn
 11189                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11190                                  
 11191                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11192                                  
 11193                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11194                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11195                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11196                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11197                                  
 11198                                  do_write:				
 11199 00000B0C 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11200 00000B10 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11201 00000B12 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11202 00000B16 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11203                                  
 11204                                  do_norm:				
 11205 00000B18 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11206 00000B1B EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11208                                  
 11209                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11210                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11211                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11212                                  
 11213                                  doverify:				
 11214 00000B1D 58                      		pop	ax
 11215 00000B1E 50                      		push	ax
 11216 00000B1F B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11217 00000B21 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11218 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11219                                  
 11220                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11221                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11222                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11223                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11224                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11225                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11226                                  
 11227 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11228 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11229 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11230 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11231 00000B31 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11232 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11234                                  
 11235                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11236 00000B36 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11237 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11238 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11240                                  
 11241                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11242                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11243                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11244                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11245                                  
 11246                                  dskerr:					
 11247 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11248 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11249 00000B46 E81C0D                  		call	checkio
 11250                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11251 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11252 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11253 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11254 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11255                                  dochkagain:				
 11256 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11257                                  dskerr0:				
 11258 00000B5B 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11259 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11260                                  					; fnon_removable
 11261 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11262 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11263 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11264                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11265 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11266 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11267 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11268                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11269                                  dskerr1:				
 11270 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11271                                  		;jmp	retry
 11272                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11273 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11274                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11275                                  
 11276                                  write_fault_err:			
 11277 00000B78 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11278                                  					; for write fault error.
 11279 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11280                                  
 11281                                  		; fall into harderr
 11282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11283                                  
 11284                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11285                                  
 11286                                  harderr:				
 11287 00000B7D E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11288                                  harderr2:				
 11289 00000B80 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11290                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11291 00000B85 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11292 00000B89 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11293                                  
 11294                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11295                                  
 11296                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11297                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11298 00000B8D E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11299                                  
 11300                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11301                                  
 11302                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11303                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11304                                  
 11305                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11306                                  normspeed:
 11307 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11308 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11309 00000B97 06                      		push	es
 11310 00000B98 50                      		push	ax
 11311 00000B99 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11312 00000B9C C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11313 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11314 00000BA4 58                      		pop	ax
 11315 00000BA5 07                      		pop	es
 11316 00000BA6 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11317 00000BA9 06                      		push	es
 11318 00000BAA C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11319 00000BAE 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11320                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11321 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11322 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11323                                  
 11324                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11325                                  
 11326                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11327                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11328                                  
 11329                                  fastspeed:		
 11330 00000BB5 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11331                                  					; ftoobig
 11332 00000BBA 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11333 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11334 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11335 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11336 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11337 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11338 00000BC8 C3                      		retn
 11339                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11340                                  
 11341                                  notready:				
 11342 00000BC9 F9                      		stc
 11343 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11344 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11345                                  
 11346                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11347                                  
 11348                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11349                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11350                                  
 11351                                  maperror:	
 11352 00000BCD 51                      		push	cx
 11353 00000BCE 06                      		push	es
 11354 00000BCF 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11355 00000BD0 07                      		pop	es
 11356 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11357 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11358 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11359                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11360 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11361 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11362                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11363 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11364                                  					; get translation
 11365                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11366                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11367 00000BE1 07                      		pop	es
 11368 00000BE2 59                      		pop	cx
 11369 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11370 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11371                                  
 11372                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11373                                  
 11374                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11375                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11376                                  
 11377                                  set_tim:		
 11378 00000BE5 50                      		push	ax
 11379 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11380                                  
 11381                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11382                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11383                                  
 11384 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11385 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11386 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11387                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11388                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11389 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11390                                  setaccess:				
 11391 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11392 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11393 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11394                                  done_set:				
 11395 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11396                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11397 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11398 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11399                                  
 11400                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11401                                  
 11402                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11403                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11404                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11405                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11406                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11407                                  
 11408                                  again:	
 11409 00000C05 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11410 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11411 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11412                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11413 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11414 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11416                                  
 11417                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11418 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11419 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11420

 11431                                  ;
 11432                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11433                                  ;
 11434                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11435                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11436                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11437                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11438                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11439                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11440                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11441                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11442                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11443

 11445

 11449 00000C12 00                      		db 0
 11450                                  
 11451                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11452                                  %if 0
 11453                                  
 11454                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11455                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11456                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11457                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack

 11459                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11460                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11467                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11468                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack

 11474

 11500                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11501                                  ;
 11502                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11503                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 11504                                  ; Added for 5.00

 11506                                  
 11507 00000C37 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11508 00000C38 40                      		db 40h			; SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11509 00000C39 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 11510 00000C3A 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 11511 00000C3B 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 11512 00000C3C 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK
 11513 00000C3D 66                      		db 66h			; GET_MEDIA_ID
 11514 00000C3E 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID
 11515 00000C3F 67                      		db 67h			; GET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11516 00000C40 47                      		db 47h			; SET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11517 00000C41 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
 11518

 11524                                  
 11525                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11526                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11527                                  ;
 11528                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11529                                  ;
 11530                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11531                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11532                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11533                                  ;
 11534                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11812                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11813                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11814                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11815                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11816                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11817                                  ;
 11818                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11819                                  ;
 11820                                  ; output:
 11821                                  ;	for status call:
 11822                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11823                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11824                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11825                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11826                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11827                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11828                                  ;
 11829                                  ;	for format track:
 11830                                  ;		carry set if error
 11831                                  ;
 11832                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11833                                  
 11834                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11835                                  
 11836                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11837                                  FormatTrack:
 11838 00000D94 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]

 11840 00000D9B F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11841                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 11984                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11985                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11986                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11987                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11988                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11989                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11990                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11991                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11992                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11993                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11994                                  		; register.

 11996                                  					; Special function requested?

 12097                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 12099                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12100                                  
 12101                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12102                                  ;
 12103                                  ; TrackIo:
 12104                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12105                                  ;
 12106                                  ;   input:
 12107                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12108                                  ;		  3 = write
 12109                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12110                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12111                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12112                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12113                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12114                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12115                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12116                                  ;
 12117                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12118                                  
 12119                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12120                                  		
 12121                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12122                                  TrackIo:	
 12123                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12124 00000EED 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12125 00000EF1 E845F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12126 00000EF4 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12127                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12128 00000EF9 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12129 00000EFB 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12130 00000EFC 51                      		push	cx
 12131 00000EFD E897FA                  		call	iosetup
 12132 00000F00 59                      		pop	cx
 12133 00000F01 58                      		pop	ax
 12134                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12135 00000F02 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12136 00000F05 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12137 00000F07 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12138 00000F09 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12139                                  
 12140                                  		; WE WANT:
 12141                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12142                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12143                                  		
 12144 00000F0B BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12145                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12146 00000F0E 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12147                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12148                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12149 00000F13 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12150                                  		
 12151 00000F15 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12152                                  ionextsector:				
 12153 00000F17 51                      		push	cx
 12154 00000F18 52                      		push	dx
 12155 00000F19 46                      		inc	si
 12156 00000F1A 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12157                                  					; the track table
 12158 00000F1B AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12159 00000F1C A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12160                                  
 12161                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12162                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12163                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12164                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12165                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12166                                  		
 12167                                  		; 12/12/2022
