 12175                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12176 00000F2B 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12177 00000F2D 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12178 00000F31 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12179 00000F33 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 12180 00000F36 5A                      		pop	dx
 12181 00000F37 59                      		pop	cx
 12182 00000F38 F8                      		clc
 12183 00000F39 C3                      		retn
 12184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12185                                  
 12186                                  IoRemovable:				
 12187 00000F3A AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12188                                  					; table	and save it
 12189 00000F3B 50                      		push	ax
 12190 00000F3C 56                      		push	si
 12191 00000F3D 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12192 00000F3E 50                      		push	ax
 12193 00000F3F 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12194                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12195 00000F43 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12196 00000F47 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12197 00000F4A 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12198 00000F4D 58                      		pop	ax
 12199 00000F4E 1F                      		pop	ds
 12200 00000F4F 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12201 00000F51 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12202 00000F54 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk

 12204                                  					; sector size
 12205 00000F58 58                      		pop	ax

 12207 00000F5C 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12208 00000F5E 5A                      		pop	dx
 12209 00000F5F 59                      		pop	cx

 12211 00000F62 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12212                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12213                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12214 00000F67 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12215 00000F69 E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12216                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12217                                  NoNeedDone:				
 12218 00000F6C F8                      		clc
 12219                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12220 00000F6D C3                      		retn
 12221                                  
 12222                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12223                                  
 12224                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12225                                  ;
 12226                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12227                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12228                                  ; are permissible.
 12229                                  ;
 12230                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12231                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12232                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12233                                  ;
 12234                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12235                                  
 12236                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 12237 00000F6E 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12238                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 12239 00000F71 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 12240 00000F73 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12241 00000F75 C3                      		retn
 12242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12243                                  
 12244                                  OneK:					
 12245 00000F76 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12246 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 12247                                  
 12248                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12249                                  
 12250                                  
 12251                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 12252 00000F79 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12253 00000F7B B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12254 00000F7E D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl

 12261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12262                                  ;
 12263                                  ; SetDASD
 12264                                  ;
 12265                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12266                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12267                                  ;
 12268                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12269                                  ;
 12270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12271                                  
 12272                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12273                                  SetDasd:	
 12274 00000F81 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12275                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12276 00000F86 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12277                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12278 00000F88 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12279                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12280                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12281 00000F8D 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12282                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12283 00000F8F 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12284                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12285                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12286                                  DoSetDasd:				
 12287 00000F94 C606[3906]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12288 00000F99 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12289 00000F9E B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12290 00000FA0 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12291                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12292 00000FA5 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 12293 00000FA7 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12294                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12295 00000FAC 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 12296 00000FAE B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12297 00000FB0 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet
 12298                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12299                                  
 12300                                  GotBig:					
 12301 00000FB2 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12302 00000FB4 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12303 00000FB9 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12304                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12305                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12306                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12307                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12308 00000FBB 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12309 00000FBC C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12310                                  DoSet:					
 12311 00000FC1 1E                      		push	ds
 12312 00000FC2 56                      		push	si
 12313 00000FC3 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12314                                  
 12315 00000FC7 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12316                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12317                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 12318                                  
 12319 00000FCB C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12320                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12321 00000FCF 5E                      		pop	si
 12322 00000FD0 1F                      		pop	ds
 12323 00000FD1 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12324 00000FD3 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12325 00000FD7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12326                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12327                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 12328 00000FD9 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12329 00000FDD 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12330 00000FE1 C3                      		retn
 12331                                  
 12332                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12333                                  
 12334                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12335                                  
 12336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12337                                  ;
 12338                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12339                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12340                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12341                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12342                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12343                                  ;
 12344                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12345                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12346                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12347                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12348                                  ;
 12349                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12350                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12351                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12352                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12353                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12354                                  ;
 12355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12356                                  
 12357                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12358                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12359 00000FE2 51                      		push	cx
 12360 00000FE3 52                      		push	dx
 12361                                  
 12362                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12363                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12364                                  
 12365 00000FE4 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12366 00000FE9 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12367 00000FEB 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12368 00000FED 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12369 00000FF2 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12370 00000FF4 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12371                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12372                                  
 12373                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12374 00000FF6 06                      		push	es
 12375 00000FF7 56                      		push	si
 12376 00000FF8 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12377 00000FFC 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12378                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12379                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12380 00001001 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12381 00001005 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12382                                  
 12383                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12384                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.

 12386 00001009 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12387 0000100E 5E                      		pop	si
 12388 0000100F 07                      		pop	es
 12389                                  
 12390                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12391 00001010 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12392 00001014 49                      		dec	cx
 12393 00001015 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12394 00001018 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12395 0000101A D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12396 0000101C 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12397 0000101E 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12398 00001022 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12399 00001026 06                      		push	es
 12400 00001027 1E                      		push	ds
 12401 00001028 56                      		push	si
 12402 00001029 57                      		push	di
 12403 0000102A B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12404 0000102C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12405                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12406 0000102E 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12407 00001030 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12408 00001035 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting

 12410 00001038 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12411 0000103C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12413                                  					; Get current disk base	table

 12415 00001045 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it

 12476                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12477                                  
 12478                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12479                                  ;
 12480                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12481                                  ;
 12482                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12483                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12484                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12485                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12486                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12487                                  ;
 12488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12489                                  
 12490                                  ResetDisk:	
 12491 00001078 50                      		push	ax
 12492 00001079 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12493                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12494 0000107E 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12495                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12496 00001080 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12497                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12498 00001085 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12499 00001087 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12500                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12501 00001089 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12502                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12503 0000108E 58                      		pop	ax
 12504 0000108F C3                      		retn

 12508                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12509                                  
 12510                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12511                                  ;
 12512                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12513                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12514                                  ;
 12515                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12516                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12517                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12518                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12519                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12520                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12521                                  ;
 12522                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12523                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12524                                  ;
 12525                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12526                                  
 12527                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12528                                  ToRom:	
 12529 00001090 53                      		push	bx
 12530 00001091 56                      		push	si
 12531                                  
 12532                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12533                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12534                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]

 12541                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?

 12545 000010A5 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12547                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table

 12550

 12555                                  					; Important for	format

 12557                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12558                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12559 000010C5 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12560 000010C6 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK

 12562                                  MotorStrtOK:

 12564 000010CE 58                      		pop	ax
 12565                                  GotValidDpt:

 12573 000010E4 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12574 000010E5 5E                      		pop	si
 12575 000010E6 5B                      		pop	bx

 12579                                  
 12580                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12581                                  
 12582                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12583                                  
 12584                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12585                                  ;
 12586                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12587                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12588                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12589                                  ;
 12590                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12591                                  
 12592                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12593                                  ioctl_getown:
 12594 000010E8 E8E0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12595 000010EB 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12596                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12597 000010EF C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12598                                  ownloop:				
 12599 000010F3 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12600 000010F7 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12601                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12602 000010F9 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12603                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12604                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12605 000010FE 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12606                                  getnextBDS:				
 12607 00001100 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12608 00001103 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12610                                  
 12611                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12612                                  ;
 12613                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12614                                  ; in al to al.
 12615                                  ;
 12616                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12617                                  
 12618                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12619                                  ioctl_setown:
 12620 00001105 E8C3F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12621 00001108 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12622                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12623 0000110D E829F7                  		call	checksingle
 12624 00001110 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12625                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12626                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12627                                  
 12628                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12629                                  ;
 12630                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12631                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12632                                  ;
 12633                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12634                                  
 12635                                  exitown:				
 12636 00001115 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12637                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12638 00001117 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12639                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12640                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12641 0000111C 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12642 0000111E 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12643                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12644                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12645 00001122 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12646                                  exitnomult:				
 12647 00001124 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12648 00001128 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12649                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12650                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12651                                  		; cf=0
 12652                                  		;clc
 12653 0000112B C3                      		retn

 12662                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.

 12708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12709                                  
 12710                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12711                                  
 12712                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12713                                  ;	get media id
 12714                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12715                                  ;
 12716                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12717                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12718                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12719                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12720                                  ;
 12721                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12722                                  ;
 12723                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12724                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12725                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12726                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12727                                  ;
 12728                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12729                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12730                                  ;
 12731                                  ; LOGIC:
 12732                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12733                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12734                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12735                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12736                                  ;
 12737                                  ; {
 12738                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12739                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12740                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12741                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12742                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12743                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12744                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12745                                  ;		};
 12746                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12747                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12748                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12749                                  ;		};
 12750                                  ;	else
 12751                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12752                                  ;
 12753                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12754                                  
 12755                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12756                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12757                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12758                                  
 12759                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12760                                  GetMediaId:
 12761 00001154 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12762 00001157 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12763 0000115B C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12764 00001160 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12765 00001163 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12766                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12767 00001165 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12768                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12769 0000116A 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12770                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12771 0000116C BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12772 0000116F 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12773                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12774                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12775 00001172 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12776 00001174 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12777 00001178 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12778                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12779 0000117C 46                      		inc	si
 12780                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12781                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12782 0000117D 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12783 00001180 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12784                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12785                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12786 00001183 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12787                                  	
 12788                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12789                                  		; cf = 0
 12790                                  		;clc
 12791                                  
 12792 00001185 C3                      		retn
 12793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12794                                  
 12795                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12796 00001186 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12797 00001188 F9                      		stc
 12798                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12799 00001189 C3                      		retn
 12800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12801                                  
 12802                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12803                                  
 12804                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12805                                  ;  set media id
 12806                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12807                                  
 12808                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12809                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12810                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12811                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12812                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12813                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12814                                  ;
 12815                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12816                                  ;
 12817                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12818                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12819                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12820                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12821                                  ;
 12822                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12823                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12824                                  ;
 12825                                  ; logic:
 12826                                  ;
 12827                                  ; {
 12828                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12829                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12830                                  ;	BootIo;
 12831                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12832                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12833                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12834                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12835                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12836                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12837                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12838                                  ;		};
 12839                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12840                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12841                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12842                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12843                                  ;		};
 12844                                  ;	else
 12845                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12846                                  ;
 12847                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12848                                  
 12849                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12850                                  SetMediaId:
 12851 0000118A E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12852 0000118D 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12853                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12854 00001191 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12855 00001193 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12856 00001198 52                      		push	dx
 12857 00001199 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12858 0000119C 5A                      		pop	dx
 12859 0000119D 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12860                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12861 0000119F 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12862                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12863 000011A4 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12864 000011A6 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12865                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12866 000011AB 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12867 000011AD 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12868 000011AE 57                      		push	di
 12869 000011AF 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12870 000011B0 07                      		pop	es
 12871 000011B1 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12872 000011B4 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12873 000011B8 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12874 000011BB 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12875 000011BE B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12876                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12877                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12878 000011C1 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12879 000011C3 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12880 000011C4 1F                      		pop	ds
 12881 000011C5 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12882 000011C6 07                      		pop	es
 12883 000011C7 E86BF5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12884 000011CA 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12885 000011CC C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12886 000011D1 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12887 000011D4 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12888                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12889                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12890 000011D9 C3                      		retn
 12891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12892                                  
 12893                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12894 000011DA B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12895 000011DC F9                      		stc
 12896                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12897 000011DD C3                      		retn
 12898                                  
 12899                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12900                                  
 12901                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12902                                  
 12903                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12904                                  ;	BootIo
 12905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12906                                  ;
 12907                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12908                                  ;
 12909                                  ; input :
 12910                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12911                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12912                                  ;
 12913                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12914                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12915                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12916                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12917                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12918                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12919                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12920                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12921                                  ;
 12922                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12923                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12924                                  ;
 12925                                  ; logic:
 12926                                  ;
 12927                                  ; {
 12928                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12929                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12930                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12931                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12932                                  ; }
 12933                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12934                                  
 12935                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12936                                  BootIo:	
 12937 000011DE 06                      		push	es
 12938 000011DF 57                      		push	di
 12939 000011E0 53                      		push	bx
 12940 000011E1 1E                      		push	ds
 12941 000011E2 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12942                                  
 12943                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12944                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12945                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12946                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12947                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12948                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12949                                  
 12950 000011E3 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12951 000011E6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12952 000011E8 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12953 000011EC B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12954 000011EF E8D5F6                  		call	diskio
 12955 000011F2 5B                      		pop	bx
 12956 000011F3 5F                      		pop	di
 12957 000011F4 07                      		pop	es
 12958 000011F5 C3                      		retn
 12959                                  
 12960                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12961                                  
 12962                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12963                                  
 12964                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12965                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12966                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12967                                  ;
 12968                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12969                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12970                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12971                                  ; history in the flags.
 12972                                  ;
 12973                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12974                                  ;
 12975                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12976                                  ;
 12977                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12978                                  ;
 12979                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12980                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12981                                  ;
 12982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12983                                  
 12984                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12985 000011F6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12986 000011FA 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12987 000011FC 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12988                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12989 000011FE 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12990                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12991                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12992 00001203 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12993 00001205 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12994 0000120A 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12995 0000120C E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12996 0000120F 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12997                                  
 12998                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12999                                  
 13000 00001211 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13001 00001213 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13002                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13003                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13004 00001215 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13005 00001217 53                      		push	bx
 13006 00001218 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13007                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13008                                  					; physical drive
 13009 0000121B E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13010 0000121E 5B                      		pop	bx
 13011                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13012 0000121F C3                      		retn
 13013                                  
 13014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13015                                  
 13016                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13017                                  
 13018                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13019                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13020                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13021                                  ;
 13022                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13023                                  ;
 13024                                  ; INPUT :
 13025                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13026                                  ;
 13027                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13028                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13029                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13030                                  
 13031                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13032                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13033 00001220 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13034 00001224 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13035                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13036                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13037 00001227 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13038                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13039 00001229 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13040                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13041                                  					; unformatted_media
 13042 0000122E 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13043 00001230 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13044                                  
 13045                                  GafDone:				
 13046 00001232 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13047 00001235 C3                      		retn
 13048                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13049                                  
 13050                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13051                                  
 13052                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13053                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13054                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13055                                  ;
 13056                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13057                                  ;
 13058                                  ; input :
 13059                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13060                                  ;
 13061                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13062                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13063                                  
 13064                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13065                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13066 00001236 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13067 0000123A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13068                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13069 0000123D 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13070                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13071                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13072 00001242 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13073 00001246 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13074                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13075 00001248 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13076                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13077                                  					; unformatted_media
 13078                                  saf_Done:				
 13079 0000124D C3                      		retn
 13080                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13081                                  
 13082                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13083                                  
 13084                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13085                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13086                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13087                                  ;
 13088                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13089                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13090                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13091                                  ;
 13092                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13093                                  
 13094                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13095                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13096 0000124E 06                      		push	es
 13097 0000124F C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13098 00001253 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13099                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13100 00001257 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13101                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13102 00001259 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13103 0000125B 0E                      		push	cs
 13104 0000125C 07                      		pop	es
 13105 0000125D B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13106                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13107 00001260 BF[370C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13108                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13109                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13110 00001263 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13111 00001265 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13112 00001267 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13113 00001269 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13114                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13115                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13116                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13117                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13118                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13119                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13120                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 13121 0000126C 07                      		pop	es
 13122                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13123                                  		; cf = 0
 13124                                  		;clc
 13125 0000126D C3                      		retn
 13126                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13127                                  nosupport:				
 13128 0000126E 07                      		pop	es
 13129 0000126F E963EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13131                                  
 13132                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13133                                  
 13134                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13135                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13136                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13137                                  ;
 13138                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13139                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13140                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13141                                  ;	    drive)
 13142                                  ;
 13143                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13144                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13145                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13146                                  ;
 13147                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13148                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13149                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13150                                  ;
 13151                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13152                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13153                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13154                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13155                                  ;
 13156                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13157                                  ;
 13158                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13159                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13160                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13161                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13162                                  ; 
 13163                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13164                                  
 13165                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13166                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13167 00001272 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13168 00001276 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13169                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13170                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13171 00001279 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13172 0000127B 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13173                                  		;
 13174 0000127D 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13175                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13176                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13177                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13178 00001281 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13179                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13180 00001283 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13181 00001285 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13182 00001287 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13183                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13184 00001289 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13185 0000128B 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13186 0000128D 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13187 0000128F 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13188 00001291 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13189 00001293 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13190 00001295 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13191 00001297 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13192                                  GotMediaType:				
 13193 00001299 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13194                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13195                                  		; cf = 0
 13196                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13197 0000129C C3                      		retn
 13198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13199                                  
 13200                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13201 0000129D 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13202 000012A0 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13203 000012A2 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13204 000012A4 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13205 000012A7 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13206                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13207 000012A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13208                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13209 000012AB B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13210 000012AD F9                      		stc
 13211 000012AE C3                      		retn
 13212                                  
 13213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13214                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13215                                  		;db    0
 13216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13217                                  
 13218                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13219                                  
 13220                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13221                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13222                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13223                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13224                                  
 13225                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13226                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13227                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13228                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13229                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13230                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13231                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13232                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13233                                  ;
 13234                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13235                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13236                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13237                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13238                                  ;
 13239                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13240                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13241                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13242                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13243                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13244                                  ;
 13245                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13246                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13247                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13248                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13249                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13250                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13251                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13252                                  
 13253                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13254                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13255                                  
 13256                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13257                                  
 13258                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13259 000012AF 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13260 000012B2 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13261 000012B4 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13262 000012B7 743B                    		jz	short mine
 13263                                  
 13264                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13265                                  
 13266 000012B9 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13267 000012BC 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 13268 000012BE 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13269 000012C1 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13270 000012C3 E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13272                                  
 13273                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13274 000012C6 CF                      		iret
 13275                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13276                                  
 13277                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 13278 000012C7 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13279 000012C8 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13280                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13281                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13282                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13283 000012CA 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13284                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13285                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13286                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13287                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13288                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13289 000012CF FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 13290 000012D3 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13291 000012D7 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 13292 000012DB FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13293                                  
 13294                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13295                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax

 13427 00001370 E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13428                                  		; 10/12/2022
