 14537                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14538 00001765 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14539 00001767 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14539 00001770 736B6574746520666F-
 14539 00001779 7220647269766520   
 14540                                  
 14541                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14542 00001781 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14542 0000178A 65737320616E79206B-
 14542 00001793 6579207768656E2072-
 14542 0000179C 656164790D0A       
 14543 000017A2 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14544                                  
 14545                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14546                                  
 14547                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14548                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14549                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14550                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14551                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14552                                  
 14553                                  chkopcnt:		
 14554 000017A4 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14555 000017A9 C3                      		retn
 14556                                  
 14557                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14558                                  
 14559                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14560                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14561                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14562                                  ;
 14563                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14564                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14565                                  
 14566                                  mediacheck:	
 14567 000017AA E88CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14568 000017AD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14569 000017AF E85501                  		call	haschange
 14570 000017B2 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14571 000017B4 E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14572 000017B7 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14573 000017B9 50                      		push	ax
 14574 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14575 000017BB 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14576                                  					; set logical drive number
 14577 000017BF B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14578 000017C1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14579                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14580                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14581 000017C3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14582 000017C4 58                      		pop	ax
 14583 000017C5 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14584 000017C7 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14585                                  
 14586                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14587                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14588                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14589                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14590                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14591                                  ; status.
 14592                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14593 000017CA 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14594 000017CE 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14595                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14596                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14597                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14598                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14599 000017D2 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14600                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14601                                  
 14602                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14603                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14604                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14605                                  
 14606 000017D4 50                      		push	ax
 14607 000017D5 51                      		push	cx
 14608 000017D6 52                      		push	dx
 14609 000017D7 E879ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14610 000017DA 5A                      		pop	dx
 14611 000017DB 59                      		pop	cx
 14612 000017DC 58                      		pop	ax
 14613 000017DD 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14614 000017DF 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14615                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14616 000017E1 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14617                                  mediaret:				
 14618 000017E3 C3                      		retn
 14619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14620                                  
 14621                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14622                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14623                                  ; or write.
 14624                                  
 14625                                  mediadovolid:				
 14626 000017E4 E811EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14627 000017E7 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14628 000017E9 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14629 000017EC 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14630 000017EE E9DCF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14632                                  
 14633                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14634                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14635                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14636                                  ; dos.
 14637                                  ;
 14638                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14639                                  
 14640                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14641                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14642                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14643                                  
 14644                                  checklatchio:	
 14645                                  
 14646                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14647                                  			
 14648 000017F1 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14649 000017F4 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14650                                  
 14651                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14652                                  
 14653 000017F6 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14654 000017F9 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14655                                  
 14656                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14657                                  ; expensive verification.
 14658                                  
 14659 000017FB E8FAED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14660 000017FE 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14661 00001800 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14662 00001803 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14663 00001805 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14664 00001807 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14665 00001809 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14666                                  checklatchret:				
 14667 0000180C E8BEF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14668                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14669 0000180F F9                      		stc
 14670 00001810 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14671                                  checkret:				
 14672 00001811 C3                      		retn
 14673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14674                                  
 14675                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14676                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14677                                  ;
 14678                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14679                                  
 14680                                  checkfatvid:				
 14681 00001812 E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14682 00001815 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14683 00001817 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14684                                  
 14685                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14686                                  
 14687                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14688                                  
 14689                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14690                                  
 14691                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14692                                  ;
 14693                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14694                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14695                                  ;
 14696                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14697                                  ;
 14698                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14699                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14700                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14701                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14702                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14703                                  ;
 14704                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14705                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14706                                  ; routine.)
 14707                                  ;
 14708                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14709                                  
 14710                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14711                                  check_vid:
 14712                                  
 14713                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14714                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14715                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14716                                  
 14717 00001819 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14718                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14719                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14720 0000181E 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14721 00001820 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14722 00001823 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14723 00001825 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14724 00001827 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14725                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14726 0000182C 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14727                                  					; if not fat system
 14728 0000182E E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14729 00001831 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14730 00001833 E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14731 00001836 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14732                                  					; definitely changed
 14733 00001839 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14734                                  
 14735 0000183B 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14736                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14737 0000183C E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14738                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14739                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14740                                  		;clc
 14741                                  checkfatret:				
 14742 0000183F C3                      		retn
 14743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14744                                  
 14745                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14746                                  changed_drv:
 14747 00001840 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14748 00001841 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14749                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14750 00001846 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14752                                  
 14753                                  ; extended id check
 14754                                  
 14755                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14756                                  
 14757                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14758                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14759                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14760                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14761                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14762                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14763                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14764                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14765                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14766                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14767                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14768                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14769                                  ;
 14770                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14771                                  
 14772                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14773                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14774 00001847 50                      		push	ax
 14775                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14776                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14777 00001848 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14778 0000184B 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14779 0000184F 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14780 00001851 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14781 00001854 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14782 00001858 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14783 0000185A 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14784                                  					; don't know
 14785 0000185C 58                      		pop	ax
 14786 0000185D EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14787                                  					; reset the flag
 14788                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14789                                  
 14790                                  ext_changed:				
 14791 0000185F 58                      		pop	ax
 14792 00001860 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14793                                  					; disk changed!
 14794                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14795                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14796                                  		;clc
 14797 00001863 EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14798                                  
 14799                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14800                                  
 14801                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14802                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14803                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14804                                  ;
 14805                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14806                                  
 14807                                  checkio:				
 14808 00001865 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14809 00001868 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14810 0000186A E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14811 0000186D 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14812 0000186F E886ED                  		call	GetBp
 14813 00001872 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14814 00001874 E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14815 00001877 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14816 00001879 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14817 0000187B 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14818 0000187D 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14819 0000187E C3                      		retn
 14820                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14821                                  
 14822                                  checkioerr:				
 14823 0000187F E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14824                                  
 14825                                  checkioret:				
 14826 00001882 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14827 00001883 E9F7F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14829                                  
 14830                                  no_error_map:				
 14831 00001886 E9F7F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14832                                  
 14833                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14834                                  
 14835                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14836                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14837                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14838                                  
 14839                                  returnvid:		
 14840 00001889 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14841                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14842 0000188C E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14843 0000188F B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14844 00001891 F9                      		stc
 14845 00001892 C3                      		retn
 14846                                  
 14847                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14848                                  
 14849                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14850                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14851                                  ;
 14852                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14853                                  ; **trashes si**
 14854                                  
 14855                                  media_set_vid:				
 14856 00001893 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14857                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14858                                  
 14859                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14860                                  
 14861                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14862                                  
 14863                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14864                                  
 14865                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14866                                  vid_into_packet:
 14867 00001896 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14868 00001897 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14869 0000189B 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14870 0000189E 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14871 000018A0 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14872 000018A3 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14873 000018A6 1F                      		pop	ds
 14874                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14875 000018A7 C3                      		retn
 14876                                  
 14877                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14878                                  
 14879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14880                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14881                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14882                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14883                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14884                                  ;
 14885                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14886                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14887                                  ;
 14888                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14889                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14890                                  ;		carry set
 14891                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14892                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14893                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14894                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14895                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14896                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14897                                  ;
 14898                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14899                                  
 14900                                  hidensity:
 14901                                  
 14902                                  ; check for correct drive
 14903                                  		
 14904                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14905 000018A8 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14906                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14907                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14908 000018AD 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14909                                  
 14910                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14911                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14912                                  
 14913 000018AF 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14914 000018B4 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14915                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14916                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14917 000018B6 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14918 000018B9 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14919                                  
 14920                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14921                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14922                                  
 14923 000018BB 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14924                                  					; ffOther
 14925 000018C0 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14926 000018C2 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14927                                  					; ff288
 14928 000018C7 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14929 000018C9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14930 000018CB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14931                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14932                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14933 000018CE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14934                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14935                                  					; 2 sides
 14936 000018D1 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14937                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14938                                  					; & head max
 14939 000018D4 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14940 000018D7 E98DED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14942                                  
 14943                                  Is720K:					
 14944 000018DA 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14945 000018DD E94EED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14947                                  
 14948                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14949                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14950                                  		;retn
 14951                                  
 14952                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14955                                  
 14956                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14957                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14958                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14959                                  ;
 14960                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14961                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14962                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14963                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14964                                  ;
 14965                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14966                                  ;
 14967                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14968                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14969                                  
 14970                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14971 000018E0 06                      		push	es
 14972 000018E1 57                      		push	di
 14973                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14974                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14975 000018E2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14976                                  
 14977                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14978                                  
 14979                                  scan_bds:				
 14980 000018E6 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14981 000018EA 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14982                                  
 14983                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14984                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14985                                  
 14986 000018EC 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14987                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14988                                  get_next_bds:				
 14989 000018F0 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14990                                  					; go to	next bds
 14991 000018F3 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14992 000018F6 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14993 000018F8 5F                      		pop	di
 14994 000018F9 07                      		pop	es
 14995 000018FA C3                      		retn
 14996                                  
 14997                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14998                                  
 14999                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15000                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15001                                  ;
 15002                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15003                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15004                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15005                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15006                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15007                                  
 15008                                  checkromchange:	
 15009                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15010                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15011 000018FB 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15012                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15013                                  					; fchanged
 15014 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15015                                  
 15016                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15017                                  
 15018                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15019                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15020                                  ;
 15021                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15022                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15023                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15024                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15025                                  
 15026                                  resetchanged:	
 15027                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15028                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15029 00001901 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15030                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15031                                  					; ~fchanged
 15032 00001906 C3                      		retn
 15033                                  
 15034                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15035                                  
 15036                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15037                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15038                                  ;
 15039                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15040                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15041                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15042                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15043                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15044                                  
 15045                                  haschange:
 15046                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15047                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15048 00001907 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15049                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15050                                  					; fchangeline
 15051 0000190C C3                      		retn
 15052                                  
 15053                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15054                                  
 15055                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15058                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15059                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15060                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15061                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15062                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15063                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15064                                  
 15065                                  ; set_volume_id
 15066                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15067                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15068                                  ;
 15069                                  ;   on entry:
 15070                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15071                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15072                                  ;
 15073                                  ;   on exit:
 15074                                  ;	carry clear:
 15075                                  ;	   successful call
 15076                                  ;	carry set
 15077                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15078                                  
 15079                                  set_volume_id:				
 15080 0000190D 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15081 0000190E 50                      		push	ax
 15082 0000190F E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15083 00001912 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15084 00001914 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15085 00001917 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15086 00001919 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15087 0000191C E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15088                                  setvret:				
 15089                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15090                                  		; cf = 0
 15091                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15092 0000191F 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15093 00001920 5A                      		pop	dx
 15094 00001921 C3                      		retn
 15095                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15096                                  
 15097                                  seterr:					
 15098 00001922 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15099 00001923 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15100 00001924 C3                      		retn
 15101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15102 00001925 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15103                                  
 15104                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15105                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15106                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15107                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15108                                  
 15109                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15110                                  
 15111                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15112                                  
 15113                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15114                                  ;
 15115                                  ;   on entry:
 15116                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15117                                  ;
 15118                                  ;   on exit:
 15119                                  ;	carry clear
 15120                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15121                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15122                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15123                                  ;
 15124                                  ;	carry set:
 15125                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15126                                  
 15127                                  read_volume_id:
 15128 00001927 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15129 00001928 51                      		push	cx
 15130 00001929 53                      		push	bx
 15131 0000192A 50                      		push	ax
 15132 0000192B 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15133 0000192C 57                      		push	di
 15134 0000192D 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15135 0000192E 07                      		pop	es
 15136 0000192F BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15137 00001932 BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15138 00001935 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15139 00001938 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15140 0000193A 5F                      		pop	di
 15141 0000193B 07                      		pop	es
 15142 0000193C 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15143                                  					; # of fats
 15144 00001940 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15145                                  					; sectors / fat
 15146 00001944 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15147 00001946 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15148                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15149                                  					;
 15150                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15151                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15152 0000194A 2EA3[2519]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15153                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15154                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15155 0000194E 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15156                                  					; # root dir entries
 15157 00001952 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15158 00001954 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15159 00001956 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15160                                  next_sec:				
 15161 00001958 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15162 00001959 2EA1[2519]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15163                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15164                                  					; get sector #
 15165 0000195D 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15166                                  					; sectors / track
 15167 00001961 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15168 00001963 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15169                                  
 15170                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15171                                  
 15172 00001965 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15173                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15174 00001966 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15175 00001968 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15176 0000196A 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15177                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15178 0000196E 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15179 00001970 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15180 00001972 E802EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15181                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15182 00001975 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 15183 00001977 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15184 0000197A B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15185                                  fvid_loop:				
 15186 0000197C 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15187 0000197F 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15188 00001981 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15189 00001984 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15190 00001986 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15191 00001989 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15192                                  ent_loop:				
 15193 0000198B 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15194 0000198E E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15195 00001990 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15196 00001991 2EFF06[2519]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15197                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15198                                  					; next sector
 15199 00001996 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15200                                  notfound:				
 15201 00001998 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15202 0000199A EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15203                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15204                                  
 15205                                  found_vid:				
 15206 0000199C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15207 0000199D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15208 0000199F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15209 000019A0 57                      		push	di
 15210 000019A1 1E                      		push	ds
 15211 000019A2 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15212 000019A3 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15213 000019A6 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15214                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15215 000019A9 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15216 000019AB 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 15217 000019AD AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15218 000019AE 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15219 000019B0 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15220 000019B1 07                      		pop	es
 15221                                  fvid_ret:				
 15222 000019B2 58                      		pop	ax
 15223                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15224                                  		; cf = 0
 15225                                  		;clc
 15226                                  rvidret:				
 15227 000019B3 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15228 000019B4 59                      		pop	cx
 15229 000019B5 5A                      		pop	dx
 15230 000019B6 C3                      		retn
 15231                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15232                                  
 15233                                  no_vid:					
 15234 000019B7 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15235 000019B8 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15236                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15237                                  
 15238                                  readviderr:				
 15239 000019BA 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15240 000019BB 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15241 000019BC EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15242                                  
 15243                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15244                                  
 15245                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15246                                  ;
 15247                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15248                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15249                                  
 15250                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 15251 000019BE 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15252 000019BF 56                      		push	si
 15253 000019C0 51                      		push	cx
 15254 000019C1 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15255                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15256 000019C4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15257                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15258 000019C7 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15259 000019CA FC                      		cld
 15260 000019CB F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15261 000019CD 59                      		pop	cx
 15262 000019CE 5E                      		pop	si
 15263 000019CF 5F                      		pop	di
 15264 000019D0 C3                      		retn
 15265                                  
 15266                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15267                                  
 15268                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15269                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15270                                  ;
 15271                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15272                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15273                                  
 15274                                  check_volume_id:	
 15275 000019D1 57                      		push	di
 15276 000019D2 51                      		push	cx
 15277 000019D3 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15278                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15279 000019D6 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15280                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15281 000019D9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15282 000019DC FC                      		cld
 15283 000019DD F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15284 000019DF 59                      		pop	cx
 15285 000019E0 5F                      		pop	di
 15286 000019E1 C3                      		retn
 15287                                  
 15288                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15289                                  
 15290                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15291                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15292                                  ;
 15293                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15294                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15295                                  ;
 15296                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15297                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15298                                  ;
 15299                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15300                                  
 15301                                  fat_check:		
 15302 000019E2 50                      		push	ax
 15303 000019E3 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15304 000019E5 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15305 000019E8 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15306                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15307 000019EC 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15308 000019EE 4E                      		dec	si
 15309                                  okret1:					
 15310 000019EF 58                      		pop	ax
 15311 000019F0 C3                      		retn
 15312                                  
 15313                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15314                                  
 15315                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15316                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15317                                  
 15318                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15319                                  
 15320                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15321                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15322                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15323                                  
 15324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15325                                  
 15326                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15327                                  		;db 0
 15328                                  
 15329                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15330                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15331                                  
 15332                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15333 000019F1 00<rep Fh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15334                                  %endif
 15335                                  
 15336                                  ;align 16
 15337                                  
 15338                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15339                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15340                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15341                                  BCODEEND:
 15342                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15343                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15344                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15345                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15346

 15359                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT
