 30513                                  
 30514                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30515                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30516                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30517                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30518                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30519                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30520                                  ; USES:     None
 30521                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30522                                  
 30523                                  hideMCB:
 30524                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30525                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30526                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30527                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30528                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30529                                  	retn
 30530                                  
 30531                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30532                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30533                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30534                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30535                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30536                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30537                                  ; USES:     None
 30538                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30539                                  
 30540                                  unHideMCB:
 30541                                  	push	ax
 30542                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30543                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30544                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30545                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30546                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30547                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30548                                  	pop	ax
 30549                                  	retn
 30550                                  
 30551                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30552                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30553                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30554                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30555                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30556                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30557                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30558                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30559                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30560                                  
 30561                                  findUMB:
 30562                                  	push	ax
 30563                                  	push	cx
 30564                                  	push	dx
 30565                                  
 30566                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30567                                  
 30568                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30569                                  
 30570                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30571                                  	mov	es,ax
 30572                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30573                                  
 30574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30575                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30576                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30577                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30578                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30579                                  
 30580                                  fu10:	
 30581                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30582                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30583                                  
 30584                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30585                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30586                                  
 30587                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30588                                  fu20:	
 30589                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30590                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30591                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30592                                  
 30593                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30594                                  	mov     ax,es
 30595                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30596                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30597                                  	inc     ax
 30598                                  	mov     es,ax
 30599                                  
 30600                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30601                                  fuE:	
 30602                                  	stc
 30603                                  fuX:
 30604                                  	pop	dx
 30605                                  	pop	cx
 30606                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30607                                  	retn
 30608                                  
 30609                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30610                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30611                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30612                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30613                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30614                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30615                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30616                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30617                                  
 30618                                  BigFree:
 30619                                  	push	bx
 30620                                  	push	cx
 30621                                  
 30622                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30623                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30624                                  
 30625                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30626                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30627                                  
 30628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30629                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30630                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30631                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30633                                  
 30634                                  bf10:	
 30635                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30636                                  	jz	short bf30
 30637                                  
 30638                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30639                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30640                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30641                                  
 30642                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30643                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30644                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30645                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30646                                  
 30647                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30648                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30649                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30650                                  
 30651                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30652                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30653                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30654                                  
 30655                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30656                                  	mov     ax,es
 30657                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30658                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30659                                  	inc     ax
 30660                                  	mov     es,ax
 30661                                  
 30662                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30663                                  
 30664                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30665                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30666                                  	or	bx,bx
 30667                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30668                                  bfE:	
 30669                                  	stc
 30670                                  bfX:
 30671                                  	pop	cx
 30672                                  	pop	bx
 30673                                  	retn
 30674                                  
 30675                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30676                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30677                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30678                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30679                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30680                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30681                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30682                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30683                                  
 30684                                  isSpecified:
 30685                                  	push	ax
 30686                                  
 30687                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30688                                  	mov	bl,al
 30689                                  
 30690                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30691                                  	;
 30692                                  	;push	ds
 30693                                  	;push	cs
 30694                                  	;pop	ds
 30695                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30696                                  	;pop	ds
 30697                                  	
 30698                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30699                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30700                                  
 30701                                  	pop	ax
 30702                                  	retn
 30703                                  
 30704                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30705                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30706                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30707                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30708                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30709                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30710                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30711                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30712                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30713                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30714                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30715                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30716                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30717                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30718                                  
 30719                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30720                                  
 30721                                  shrinkMCB:
 30722                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30723                                  	push	bx
 30724                                  	push	cx
 30725                                  	push	es
 30726                                  
 30727                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30728                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30729                                  
 30730                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30731                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30732                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30733                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30734                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30735                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30736                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30737                                  
 30738                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30739                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30740                                  
 30741                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30742                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30743                                  
 30744                                  	add	ax,bx
 30745                                  	inc	ax
 30746                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30747                                  
 30748                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30749                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30750                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30751                                  	; ax > 0
 30752                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30753                                  
 30754                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30755                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30756                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30757                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30758                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30759                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30760                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30761                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30762                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30763                                  
 30764                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30765                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30766                                  
 30767                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30768                                  	; cf=0
 30769                                  	;clc
 30770                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30771                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30772                                  smE:	
 30773                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30774                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30775                                  	;stc
 30776                                  smX:	
 30777                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30778                                  	pop	es
 30779                                  	pop	cx
 30780                                  	pop	bx
 30781                                  	retn
 30782                                  
 30783                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30784                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30785                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30786                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30787                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30788                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30789                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30790                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30791                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30792                                  ;
 30793                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30794                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30795                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30796                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30797                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30798                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30799                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30800                                  ;       Endif
 30801                                  ;    Endif
 30802                                  ; Endif
 30803                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30804                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30805                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30806                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30807                                  ;    ENDIF
 30808                                  ; ENDIF
 30809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30810                                  
 30811                                  _hideUMB_:
 30812                                  	push	bx
 30813                                  	push	dx
 30814                                  	push	es
 30815                                  
 30816                                  	mov	al,cl
 30817                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30818                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30819                                  
 30820                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30821                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30822                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30823                                  
 30824                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30825                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30826                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30827                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30828                                  
 30829                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30830                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30831                                  
 30832                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30833                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30834                                  
 30835                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30836                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30837                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30838                                  hu_10:	
 30839                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30840                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30841                                  
 30842                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30843                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30844                                  
 30845                                  	mov	dx,es
 30846                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30847                                  
 30848                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30849                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30850                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30851                                  
 30852                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30853                                  hu_30:	
 30854                                  	mov	al,cl
 30855                                  
 30856                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30857                                  
 30858                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30859                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30860                                  
 30861                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30862                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30863                                  hu_X:	
 30864                                  	pop	es
 30865                                  	pop	dx
 30866                                  	pop	bx
 30867                                  	retn
 30868                                  
 30869                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30870                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30871                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30872                                  ; Entry:  None
 30873                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30874                                  ; Error:  None
 30875                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30876                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30877                                  
 30878                                  UnFreeze:
 30879                                  	push	ax
 30880                                  	push	es
 30881                                  
 30882                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30883                                  	jc	short ufX
 30884                                  
 30885                                  	mov	es,ax
 30886                                  
 30887                                  ; ------------------------------
 30888                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30889                                  ; ------------------------------
 30890                                  
 30891                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30892                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30893                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30894                                  uf20:	
 30895                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30896                                  
 30897                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30898                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30899                                  
 30900                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30901                                  	mov     ax,es
 30902                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30903                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30904                                  	inc     ax
 30905                                  	mov     es,ax
 30906                                  
 30907                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30908                                  ufX:	
 30909                                  	pop	es
 30910                                  	pop	ax
 30911                                  	retn
 30912                                  
 30913                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30914                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30915                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30916                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30917                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30918                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30919                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30920                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30921                                  
 30922                                  isFrozMCB:
 30923                                  	;push	ax
 30924                                  
 30925                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30926                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30927                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30928                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30929                                  
 30930                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30931                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30932                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30933                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30934                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30935                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30936                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30937                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30938                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30939                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30940                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30941                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30942                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30943                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30944                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30945                                  ifmX:	
 30946                                  	;pop	ax
 30947                                  	retn
 30948                                  
 30949                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30950                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30951                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30952                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30953                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30954                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30955                                  ; USES:     None
 30956                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30957                                  
 30958                                  frezMCB:
 30959                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30960                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30961                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30962                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30963                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30964                                  	retn
 30965                                  
 30966                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30967                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30968                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30969                                  ; Entry:  None
 30970                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30971                                  ; Error:  None
 30972                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30973                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30974                                  
 30975                                  FreezeUM:
 30976                                  	push	ax
 30977                                  	push	cx
 30978                                  	push	dx
 30979                                  	push	es
 30980                                  
 30981                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30982                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30983                                  
 30984                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30985                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30986                                  
 30987                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30988                                  	mov	es,ax
 30989                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30990                                  
 30991                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30992                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30993                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30994                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30995                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30996                                  
 30997                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30998                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30999                                  
 31000                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31001                                  fum20:	
 31002                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31003                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31004                                  
 31005                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31006                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31007                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31008                                  
 31009                                  	call	frezMCB
 31010                                  fum30:	
 31011                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31012                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31013                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31014                                  
 31015                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31016                                  	mov     ax,es
 31017                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31018                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31019                                  	inc     ax
 31020                                  	mov     es,ax
 31021                                  	
 31022                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31023                                  
 31024                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31025                                  	pop	dx
 31026                                  	pop	cx
 31027                                  	pop	ax
 31028                                  	retn
 31029                                  
 31030                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31031                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31032                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31033                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31034                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31035                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31036                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31037                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31038                                  
 31039                                  UmbTest:
 31040                                  	push	ax
 31041                                  	push	bx
 31042                                  	push	ds
 31043                                  	push	es
 31044                                  
 31045                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31046                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31047                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31048                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31049                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31050                                  
 31051                                  	pop	es
 31052                                  	pop	ds
 31053                                  	pop	bx
 31054                                  	pop	ax
 31055                                  	retn
 31056                                  
 31057                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31058                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31059                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31060                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31061                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31062                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31063                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31064                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31065                                  
 31066                                  WalkMem:
 31067                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31068                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31069                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31070                                  		   	
 31071                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31072                                  	int	21h
 31073                                  
 31074                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31075                                  	mov	es,ax
 31076                                  
 31077                                  ; ------------------------------
 31078                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31079                                  ; ------------------------------
 31080                                  
 31081                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31082                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31083                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31084                                  
 31085                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31086                                  
 31087                                  	mov     bx,es
 31088                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31089                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31090                                  	inc     bx
 31091                                  	mov     es,bx
 31092                                  		
 31093                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31094                                  um20:	
 31095                                  	mov	ax,es
 31096                                  
 31097                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31098                                  
 31099                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31100                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31101                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31102                                  	retn
 31103                                  
 31104                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31105                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31106                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31107                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31108                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31109                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31110                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31111                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31112                                  
 31113                                  hl_unlink:
 31114                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31115                                  
 31116                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31117                                  	;
 31118                                  	;push	ds
 31119                                  	;push	cs
 31120                                  	;pop	ds
 31121                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31122                                  	;pop	ds
 31123                                  
 31124                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31125                                  
 31126                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31127                                  	int	21h
 31128                                  	retn
 31129                                  
 31130                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31131                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31132                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31133                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31134                                  
 31135                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31136                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31137                                  
 31138                                  ;   Modification log:
 31139                                  ;
 31140                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31141                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31142                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31143                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31144                                  
 31145                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31146                                  
 31147                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31148                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31149                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31150                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31151                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31152                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31153                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31154                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31156                                  
 31157                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31158                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31159                                  
 31160                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31161                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31162                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31163                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31164                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31165                                  ;    every command execution.
 31166                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31167                                  
 31168                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31169                                  	;
 31170                                  	;push	ds
 31171                                  	;push	cs
 31172                                  	;pop	ds
 31173                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31174                                  	;pop	ds	
 31175                                  
 31176                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31177                                  
 31178                                  	or	al,al
 31179                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31180                                  
 31181                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31182                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31183                                  	retn			; that.
 31184                                  uhu10:	
 31185                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31186                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31187                                  
 31188                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31189                                  	;
 31190                                  	;push	es
 31191                                  	;push	cs
 31192                                  	;pop	es
 31193                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31194                                  	;pop	ds	
 31195                                  
 31196                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31197                                  
 31198                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31199                                  
 31200                                  	pop	ax
 31201                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31202                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31203                                  	retn
 31204                                  
 31205                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31206                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31207                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31208                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31209                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31210                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31211                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31212                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31213                                  
 31214                                  he_unlink:
 31215                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31216                                  
 31217                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31218                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31219                                  
 31220                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31221                                  	int	21h
 31222                                  	retn
 31223                                  
 31224                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31225                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31226                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31227                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31228                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31229                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31230                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31231                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31232                                  
 31233                                  FreeUMBs:
 31234                                  	push	ax
 31235                                  	push	es
 31236                                  
 31237                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31238                                  	jc	short fusX
 31239                                  
 31240                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31241                                  fus10:	
 31242                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31243                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31244                                  	call	freeMCB
 31245                                  fus20:	   
 31246                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31247                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31248                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31249                                  
 31250                                  	mov	ax,es
 31251                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31252                                  	inc	ax
 31253                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31254                                  
 31255                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31256                                  fusX:	
 31257                                  	pop	es
 31258                                  	pop	ax
 31259                                  	retn
 31260                                  
 31261                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31262                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31263                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31264                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31265                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31266                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31267                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31268                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31269                                  
 31270                                  isHideMCB:
 31271                                  	;push	ax
 31272                                  
 31273                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31274                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31275                                  
 31276                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31277                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31278                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31279                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31280                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31281                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31282                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31283                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31284                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31285                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31286                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31287                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31288                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31289                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31290                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31291                                  ihm_x:	
 31292                                  	;pop	ax
 31293                                  	retn
 31294                                  
 31295                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31296                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31297                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31298                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31299                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31300                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31301                                  ; USES:     AX
 31302                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31303                                  
 31304                                  freeMCB:
 31305                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31306                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31307                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31308                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31309                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31310                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31311                                  	retn
 31312                                  
 31313                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31314                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31315                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31316                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31317                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31318                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31319                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31320                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31321                                  
 31322                                  HeadUmb:
 31323                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31324                                  
 31325                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31326                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31327                                  	;push	es
 31328                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31329                                  
 31330                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31331                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31332                                  
 31333                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31334                                  	int	21h
 31335                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31336                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31337                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31338                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31339                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31340                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31341                                  
 31342                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31343                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31344                                  xhu_e:	
 31345                                  	;stc
 31346                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31347                                  xhu_x:	
 31348                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31349                                  	;pop	es	
 31350                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31351                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31352                                  	retn
 31353                                  
 31354                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31355                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31356                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31357                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31358                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31359                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31360                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31361                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31362                                  
 31363                                  linkumb:
 31364                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31365                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31366                                  
 31367                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31368                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31369                                  
 31370                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31371                                  	mov	bx,1
 31372                                  	int	21h
 31373                                  lumbX:
 31374                                  	retn
 31375                                  
 31376                                  %endif

 31378                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31379                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31380                                  
 31381                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31382                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31383                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31384                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31385                                  
 31386                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31387                                  ;
 31388                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31389                                  ;
 31390                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31391                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31392                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31393                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31394                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31395                                  ;
 31396                                  ;	Output : none
 31397                                  ;
 31398                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31399                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31400                                  ;
 31401                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31402                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31403                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31404                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31405                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31406                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31407                                  
 31408                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31409                                  InitDevLoad:
 31410                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31411                                  	; ds = cs
 31412 0000280C 803E[FB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31413                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31414                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31415 00002811 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31416                                  
 31417                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31418                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31419                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31420                                  ;
 31421                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31422                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31423                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31424                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31425                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31426                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31427                                  ;
 31428                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31429                                  ;
 31430                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31431                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31432                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31433                                  ;	pushf
 31434                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31435                                  ;	popf
 31436                                  ;
 31437                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31438                                  ;
 31439                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31440                                  
 31441                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31442                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31443                                  InitForConv:
 31444                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31445                                  	; ds = cs
 31446 00002813 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31447                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31448 00002816 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31449 00002818 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31450 0000281B E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31451 0000281E 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31452                                  					;  in low memory
 31453                                  InitForHi:
 31454                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31455                                  	; ds = cs
 31456                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31457                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31458                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31459 00002820 A1[F11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31460 00002823 8B16[ED1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31461 00002827 0316[EF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31462 0000282B EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31463                                  
 31464                                  InitForLo:
 31465                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31466                                  	; ds = cs
 31467                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31468 0000282D C606[FB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31469                                  initforlo_x:
 31470                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31471                                  	; ds = cs
 31472                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31473                                  					;  we are loading low
 31474                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31475                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31476 00002832 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31477 00002835 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31478                                  idl1:
 31479 00002839 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31480                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31481                                  	; ds = cs
 31482                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31483                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31484                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31485                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31486 0000283C A3[E01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31487 0000283F 8916[E21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31488 00002843 C706[E41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31489 00002849 A3[E61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31490 0000284C C3                      	retn
 31491                                  
 31492                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31493                                  ;
 31494                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31495                                  ;
 31496                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31497                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31498                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31499                                  ;		   current UMB
 31500                                  ;
 31501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31502                                  
 31503                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31504                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31505                                  	; ds = cs
 31506                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31507                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31508                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31509 0000284D A1[EF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31510 00002850 0306[ED1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31511 00002854 2B06[F11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31512                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31513                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31514                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31515                                  	;stc
 31516                                  	;retn
 31517                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31518 00002858 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31519 0000285B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31520                                  spcinumb1:
 31521 0000285D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31522                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31523                                  	; ds = cs
 31524 0000285E 3B06[DE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31525                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31526                                  spcinumb2:
 31527 00002862 C3                      	retn
 31528                                  
 31529                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31530                                  ;
 31531                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31532                                  ;
 31533                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31534                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31535                                  ;
 31536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31537                                  
 31538                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31539                                  ;
 31540                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31541                                  ;	push	ds
 31542                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31543                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31544                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31545                                  ;	pop	ds
 31546                                  ;
 31547                                  ;	inc	ax
 31548                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31549                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31550                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31551                                  ;	retn
 31552                                  
 31553                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31554                                  ;
 31555                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31556                                  ;
 31557                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31558                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31559                                  ;		 the device.
 31560                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31561                                  ;
 31562                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31563                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31564                                  ;	UMB.
 31565                                  ;
 31566                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31567                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31568                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31569                                  ;
 31570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31571                                  
 31572                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31573                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31574                                  
 31575                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31576                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31577                                  	; ds = cs
 31578 00002863 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31579 00002866 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31580 00002869 CD21                    	int	21h
 31581                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31582                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31583                                  
 31584 0000286B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31585 0000286D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31586                                  
 31587 0000286F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31588                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31589                                  	; ds = cs
 31590 00002870 391E[DE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31591                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31592 00002874 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31593 00002876 43                      	inc	bx
 31594                                  
 31595 00002877 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31596 0000287A CD21                    	int	21h
 31597 0000287C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31598                                  
 31599                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31600                                  	;dec	ax
 31601                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31602                                  	;
 31603                                  PrepareMark:
 31604 0000287E 1E                      	push	ds
 31605 0000287F 48                      	dec	ax
 31606 00002880 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31607 00002882 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31608 00002888 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31609 0000288E 40                      	inc	ax
 31610 0000288F 1F                      	pop	ds
 31611                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31612                                  	; ds = cs
 31613                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31614                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 31638                                  ;
 31639                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31640                                  ;
 31641                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31642                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31643                                  ;
 31644                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31645                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31646                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31647                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31648                                  ;
 31649                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31650                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31651                                  ;
 31652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31653                                  
 31654                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31655                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31656                                  
 31657                                  DevSetMark:

 31659 000028A9 57                      	push	di
 31660 000028AA 1E                      	push	ds
 31661 000028AB 56                      	push	si
 31662 000028AC 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31663 000028AE 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31664 000028B4 40                      	inc	ax
 31665 000028B5 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31666                                  
 31667                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31668                                  
 31669 000028B9 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31670 000028BA 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31671                                  
 31672 000028BF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31673 000028C1 FC                      	cld
 31674                                  dsm_again:
 31675 000028C2 AC                      	lodsb
 31676 000028C3 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31677 000028C5 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31678 000028C7 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31679 000028C9 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31680                                  isit_slash:
 31681 000028CB 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31682 000028CD 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31683 000028CF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31684 000028D1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31685                                  isit_null:
 31686 000028D3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31687 000028D5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31688 000028D7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31689                                  
 31690 000028D9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31691 000028DC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31692                                  dsm_next_char:
 31693 000028DF AC                      	lodsb
 31694 000028E0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31695 000028E2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31696 000028E4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31697 000028E6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31698 000028E8 AA                      	stosb
 31699 000028E9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31700                                  blankout:
 31701 000028EB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31702 000028ED B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31703 000028EF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31704                                  dsm_exit:
