 35284                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35285                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35286                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35287                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35288                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35289                                  print1: 
 35290                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35291                                  print2: 
 35292                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35293                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35294                                  to_input_key:
 35295                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35296                                  not_down:
 35297                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35298                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35299                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35300                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35301                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35302                                          call    show_status     ;
 35303                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35304                                  not_f8:
 35305                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35306                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35307                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35308                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35309                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35310                                  
 35311                                  normal_key:
 35312                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35313                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35314                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35315                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35316                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35317                                          retn			;
 35318                                  not_backspace:
 35319                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35320                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35321                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35322                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35323                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35324                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35325                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35326                                          jmp	short print2
 35327                                  
 35328                                  select_done:
 35329                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35330                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35331                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35332                                  
 35333                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35334                                  
 35335                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35336                                  
 35337                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35338                                  ;
 35339                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35340                                  ;
 35341                                  ;   INPUT
 35342                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35345                                  ;       None
 35346                                  ;
 35347                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35348                                  ;       None
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;   NOTES
 35351                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35352                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35353                                  ;
 35354                                  ;   HISTORY
 35355                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35356                                  ;
 35357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35358                                  
 35359                                  disp_input:
 35360                                          push    ax
 35361                                          cmp     al,' '
 35362                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35363                                          mov     al,' '
 35364                                  disp_ok:
 35365                                          mov     dl,al
 35366                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35367                                          int     21h
 35368                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35369                                          call    print
 35370                                          pop     ax
 35371                                          retn
 35372                                  
 35373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35374                                  
 35375                                  disp_num:
 35376                                          push    bx
 35377                                          add     al,'0'
 35378                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35379                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35380                                          mov     cx,1
 35381                                          int     10h
 35382                                          pop     bx
 35383                                          retn
 35384                                  
 35385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35386                                  ;
 35387                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35388                                  ;
 35389                                  ;   INPUT
 35390                                  ;       None
 35391                                  ;
 35392                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35393                                  ;       None
 35394                                  ;
 35395                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35396                                  ;       None
 35397                                  ;
 35398                                  ;   NOTES
 35399                                  ;       None
 35400                                  ;
 35401                                  ;   HISTORY
 35402                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35405                                  
 35406                                  show_status:
 35407                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35408                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35409                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35410                                          int     10h             ;
 35411                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35412                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35413                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35414                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35415                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35416                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35417                                          int     10h             ;
 35418                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35419                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35420                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35421                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35422                                  show_onoff: 
 35423                                          int     10h
 35424                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35425                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35426                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35427                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35428                                  
 35429                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35430                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35431                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35432                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35433                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35434                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35435                                          int     10h             ;
 35436                                  show_done:                      ;
 35437                                          pop     dx              ;
 35438                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35439                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35440                                          pop     bx              ;
 35441                                          retn			;
 35442                                  
 35443                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35444                                  
 35445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35446                                  ;
 35447                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35448                                  ;
 35449                                  ;   INPUT
 35450                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35451                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35452                                  ;
 35453                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35454                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35455                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35456                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35457                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35458                                  ;
 35459                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35460                                  ;       AX
 35461                                  ;
 35462                                  ;   NOTES
 35463                                  ;       None
 35464                                  ;
 35465                                  ;   HISTORY
 35466                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35467                                  ;
 35468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35469                                  
 35470                                  skip_token:
 35471                                          call    get_char
 35472                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35473                                          call    any_delim
 35474                                          jne	short skip_token
 35475                                  skip_check_eol:
 35476                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35477                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35478                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35479                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35480                                          clc
 35481                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35482                                  	retn
 35483                                  skip_token_eol:
 35484                                          stc
 35485                                  skip_token_done:
 35486                                          retn
 35487                                  
 35488                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35489                                  ;
 35490                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35491                                  ;
 35492                                  ;   INPUT
 35493                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35494                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35495                                  ;
 35496                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35497                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35498                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35499                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35500                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35501                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35504                                  ;       AX
 35505                                  ;
 35506                                  ;   NOTES
 35507                                  ;       None
 35508                                  ;
 35509                                  ;   HISTORY
 35510                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35511                                  ;
 35512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35513                                  
 35514                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35515                                          call    get_char        ;
 35516                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35517                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35518                                          call    delim           ;
 35519                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35520                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35521                                  
 35522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35523                                  ;
 35524                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35525                                  ;
 35526                                  ;   INPUT
 35527                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35528                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35529                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35530                                  ;
 35531                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35532                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35533                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35534                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35535                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35536                                  ;
 35537                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35538                                  ;       AX
 35539                                  ;
 35540                                  ;   NOTES
 35541                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35542                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35543                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35544                                  ;
 35545                                  ;   HISTORY
 35546                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35547                                  ;
 35548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35549                                  
 35550                                  skip_opt_line:
 35551                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35552                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35553                                       
 35554                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35555                                  
 35556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35557                                  ;
 35558                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35559                                  ;
 35560                                  ;   INPUT
 35561                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35562                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35563                                  ;
 35564                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35565                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35566                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35567                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35568                                  ;
 35569                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35570                                  ;       AX
 35571                                  ;
 35572                                  ;   NOTES
 35573                                  ;       None
 35574                                  ;
 35575                                  ;   HISTORY
 35576                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35577                                  ;
 35578                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35579                                  
 35580                                  skip_line:
 35581                                          call    get_char
 35582                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35583                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35584                                          jne	short skip_line
 35585                                  skip_line_done:
 35586                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35587                                          retn
 35588                                  
 35589                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35590                                  ;
 35591                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35592                                  ;
 35593                                  ;   INPUT
 35594                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35595                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35596                                  ;
 35597                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35598                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35599                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35600                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35601                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35602                                  ;
 35603                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35604                                  ;       AX
 35605                                  ;
 35606                                  ;   NOTES
 35607                                  ;       None
 35608                                  ;
 35609                                  ;   HISTORY
 35610                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35611                                  ;
 35612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35613                                  
 35614                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35615                                  
 35616                                  get_number:
 35617                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35618                                  num_loop:
 35619                                          call    get_char        ;
 35620                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35621                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35622                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35623                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35624                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35625                                          push    ax              ;
 35626                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35627                                          push    dx              ;
 35628                                          mul     bx              ;
 35629                                          pop     dx              ;
 35630                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35631                                          pop     ax              ;
 35632                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35633                                          cbw                     ;
 35634                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35635                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35636                                  
 35637                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35638                                  ;num_done:
 35639                                          ;retn
 35640                                  
 35641                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35642                                  ;
 35643                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35644                                  ;
 35645                                  ;   INPUT
 35646                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35647                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35648                                  ;
 35649                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35650                                  ;       AL == next character
 35651                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35652                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35653                                  ;
 35654                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35655                                  ;       AX
 35656                                  ;
 35657                                  ;   NOTES
 35658                                  ;       None
 35659                                  ;
 35660                                  ;   HISTORY
 35661                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35662                                  ;
 35663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35664                                  
 35665                                  get_char:
 35666                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35667                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35668                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35669                                  	es	
 35670                                  	lodsb
 35671                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35672                                          retn			;
 35673                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35674                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35675                                  nearby_ret:
 35676                                          retn
 35677                                  
 35678                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35679                                  ;
 35680                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35681                                  ;
 35682                                  ;   INPUT
 35683                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35684                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35685                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35686                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35687                                  ;
 35688                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35689                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35690                                  ;
 35691                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35692                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35693                                  ;
 35694                                  ;   NOTES
 35695                                  ;       None
 35696                                  ;
 35697                                  ;   HISTORY
 35698                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35699                                  ;
 35700                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35701                                  
 35702                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35703                                  query_user:
 35704                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35705                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35706                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35707                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35708                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35709                                  qu_1:
 35710                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35711                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35712                                          push    ax                      ;
 35713                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35714                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35715                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35716                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35717                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35718                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35719                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35720                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35721                                  query_all:
 35722                                  
 35723                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35724                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35725                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35726                                  
 35727                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35728                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35729                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35730                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35731                                  
 35732                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35733                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35734                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35735                                  find_match:                             ;
 35736                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35737                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35738                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35739                                          inc     di                      ;
 35740                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35741                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35742                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35743                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35744                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35745                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35746                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35747                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35748                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35749                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35750                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35751                                          inc     di                      ;
 35752                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35753                                          int     21h                     ;
 35754                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35755                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35756                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35757                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35758                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35759                                  cmd_notset:
 35760                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35761                                  line_print:                             ;
 35762                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35763                                          es
 35764                                  	lodsb
 35765                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35766                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35767                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35768                                  non_null:                               ;
 35769                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35770                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35771                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35772                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35773                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35774                                  non_space:                              ;
 35775                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35776                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35777                                          int     21h                     ;
 35778                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35779                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35780                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35781                                  
 35782                                  generic_prompt:
 35783                                          call    print                   ;
 35784                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35785                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35786                                          int     16h                     ;
 35787                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35788                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35789                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35790                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35791                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35792                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35793                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35794                                  not_func:
 35795                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35796                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35797                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35798                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35799                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35800                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35801                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35802                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35803                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35804                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35805                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35806                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35807                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35808                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35809                                  
 35810                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35811                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35812                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35813                                  	clc
 35814                                  do_cmd:
 35815                                  	pop     ax			;
 35816                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35817                                  	; cf=0
 35818                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35819                                  	retn
 35820                                  
 35821                                  skip_cmd:
 35822                                  	pop     ax			;
 35823                                  skip_all:
 35824                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35825                                  	stc
 35826                                  	retn
 35827                                  
 35828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35829                                  ;
 35830                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35831                                  ;
 35832                                  ;   INPUT
 35833                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35834                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35835                                  ;
 35836                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35837                                  ;       None
 35838                                  ;
 35839                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35840                                  ;       None
 35841                                  ;
 35842                                  ;   NOTES
 35843                                  ;       None
 35844                                  ;
 35845                                  ;   HISTORY

 35850                                  print_error:
 35851                                          push    ax
 35852                                          push    bx
 35853                                          push    cx
 35854                                          push    dx
 35855                                          push    ds
 35856                                          push    cs
 35857                                          pop     ds
 35858                                          pushf
 35859                                          call    get_linenum
 35860                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35861                                          call    error_line
 35862                                          popf
 35863                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35864                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35865                                          call    print
 35866                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35867                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35868                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35869                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35870                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35871                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35872                                  pe_1:     
 35873                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35874                                          call    print
 35875                                  pe_ret: 
 35876                                  	pop     ds
 35877                                          pop     dx
 35878                                          pop     cx
 35879                                          pop     bx
 35880                                          pop     ax
 35881                                  	retn
 35882                                  
 35883                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35884                                  
 35885                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35886                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35887                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35888                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35889                                  
 35890                                  disable_autoexec:
 35891                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35892                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35893                                  
 35894                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35895                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35896                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35897                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35898                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35899                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35900                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35901                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35902                                  dae_1:
 35903                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35904                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35905                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35906                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35907                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35908                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35909                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35910                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35911                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35912                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35913                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35914                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35915                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35916                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35917                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35918                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35919                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35920                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35921                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35922                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35923                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35924                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35925                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35926                                          retn
 35927                                  
 35928                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35929                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35930                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35931                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35932                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35933                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35934                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35935                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35936                                  
 35937                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35938                                  
 35939                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022

 35945                                  ;
 35946                                  ; procedure : delim
 35947                                  ;
 35948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35949                                  
 35950                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35951                                  ;
 35952                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35953                                  ;
 35954                                  ;any_delim:
 35955                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35956                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35957                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35958                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35959                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35960                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35961                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35962                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35963                                  ;
 35964                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35965                                  
 35966                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35967                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35968                                  delim:
 35969 00003079 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35970 0000307B 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35971                                  
 35972 0000307D 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35973 0000307F 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35974                                  
 35975                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35976 00003081 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35977 00003083 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35978 00003085 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35979 00003087 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35980 00003089 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35981 0000308B 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35982 0000308D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35983 0000308F 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35984 00003091 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35985                                  
 35986                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35987                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35988                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35989                                  ;	clc
 35990                                  ;;endif
 35991                                  
 35992                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35993                                  delim_ret:
 35994 00003093 C3                      	retn

 35998                                  ; procedure : newline
 35999                                  ;
 36000                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 36001                                  ;
 36002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36003                                  
 36004                                  newline:
 36005 00003094 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 36006 00003097 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 36007 00003099 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 36008 0000309B 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 36009 0000309D E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 36010                                  nl_ret:
 36011 000030A0 C3                      	retn

 36015                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36016                                  ;
 36017                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36018                                  
 36019                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36020                                  mapcase:
 36021 000030A1 51                      	push	cx
 36022 000030A2 56                      	push	si
 36023 000030A3 1E                      	push	ds
 36024                                  
 36025 000030A4 06                      	push	es
 36026 000030A5 1F                      	pop	ds
 36027                                  
 36028                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36029                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36030                                  ;
 36031                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36032                                  ;;else
 36033                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36034                                  ;;endif
 36035                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36036 000030A6 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36037                                  
 36038                                  convloop:
 36039 000030A8 AC                      	lodsb
 36040 000030A9 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36041 000030AB 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36042 000030AD 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36043 000030AF 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36044 000030B1 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36045 000030B3 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36046                                  noconv:
 36047                                  
 36048                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36049                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36050                                  ;;
 36051                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36052                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36053                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36054                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36055                                  ;;
 36056                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36057                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36058                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36059                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36060                                  ;check_eol:
 36061                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36062                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36063                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36064                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36065                                  ;;endif
 36066                                  	
 36067                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36068 000030B6 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36069                                  convdone:
 36070 000030B8 1F                      	pop	ds
 36071 000030B9 5E                      	pop	si
 36072 000030BA 59                      	pop	cx
 36073 000030BB C3                      	retn
 36074                                  
 36075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36076                                  ;
 36077                                  ; procedure : round
 36078                                  ;
 36079                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36080                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36081                                  ;
 36082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36083                                  
 36084                                  round:
 36085 000030BC 50                      	push	ax
 36086 000030BD 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36087                                  
 36088 000030C1 E8F5DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36089                                  
 36090 000030C4 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36091 000030C9 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36092 000030D0 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36093 000030D4 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36094 000030D9 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 36095 000030DB 2EF606[2E14]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36096 000030E1 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36097 000030E3 06                      	push	es
 36098 000030E4 56                      	push	si
 36099 000030E5 2E8B36[2C14]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36100 000030EA 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36101 000030EC 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36102 000030EE 48                      	dec	ax
 36103                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36104 000030EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36105 000030F3 2E8026[2E14]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36106 000030F9 5E                      	pop	si
 36107 000030FA 07                      	pop	es
 36108                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36109 000030FB 58                      	pop	ax
 36110                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36111                                  	; cf = 0
 36112                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36113                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36114 000030FC C3                      	retn
 36115                                  
 36116                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36117                                  
 36118                                  mem_err:
 36119                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36120 000030FD 0E                      	push	cs
 36121 000030FE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36122                                  mem_err2:
 36123 000030FF BA[9D38]                	mov	dx,badmem
 36124                                  	;push	cs
 36125                                  	;pop	ds
 36126 00003102 E87602                  	call	print
 36127 00003105 E945D7                  	jmp	stall

 36136                                  	; (SYSINIT:34E0h)
 36137                                  calldev:
 36138 00003108 2E8E1E[E61E]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 36139 0000310D 2E031E[E41E]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 36140 00003112 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 36141                                  
 36142 00003114 2EFF36[E41E]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 36143 00003119 2EA3[E41E]              	mov	word [cs:DevEntry],ax
 36144 0000311D BB[E603]                	mov	bx,packet
 36145 00003120 2EFF1E[E41E]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]

 36152                                  ;
 36153                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36154                                  
 36155                                  todigit:
 36156 0000312B 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 36157                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 36158                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36159 0000312D 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36160                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36161                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36162                                  	;clc
 36163                                  	;retn
 36164                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36165 0000312F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 36166 00003131 F5                      	cmc
 36167                                  notdig:
 36168                                  	;stc
 36169                                  notdig2:
 36170 00003132 C3                      	retn

 36172                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36173                                  ;
 36174                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36175                                  ;
 36176                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36177                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36178                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36179                                  ;
 36180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36181                                  
 36182                                  getnum:
 36183 00003133 53                      	push	bx
 36184 00003134 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36185                                  b2:
 36186 00003136 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36187 00003139 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36188                                  
 36189 0000313B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36190 0000313C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36191                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36192                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36193 0000313D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36194 0000313F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36195 00003141 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36196 00003142 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36197 00003144 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36198 00003147 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36199                                  
 36200 00003149 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36201                                  
 36202 0000314A E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36203 0000314D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36204 0000314F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36205 00003151 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36206 00003153 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36207 00003155 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36208 00003157 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36209 00003159 7417                    	je	short b15
 36210 0000315B 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36211 00003160 7410                    	je	short b15
 36212 00003162 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36213                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36214                                  	;nop
 36215                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36216                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36217                                  	;nop
 36218                                  	;nop
 36219 00003164 740C                    	je	short b15
 36220 00003166 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36221 00003168 7408                    	je	short b15
 36222 0000316A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36223 0000316C 7404                    	je	short b15
 36224 0000316E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36225 00003170 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36226                                  b15:
 36227 00003172 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36228 00003177 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36229                                  b1:
 36230 0000317C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36231 0000317E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36232 00003180 5B                      	pop	bx
 36233 00003181 C3                      	retn
 36234                                  badnum:
 36235                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36236                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36237 00003182 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36238                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36239 00003184 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36240 00003188 5B                      	pop	bx
 36241 00003189 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36242 0000318A C3                      	retn

 36244                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36245                                  
 36246                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36247                                  
 36248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36249                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36250                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36251                                  ;	si = 0
 36252                                  ;	ax = country id
 36253                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36254                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36255                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36256                                  ;
 36257                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36258                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36259                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36260                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36262                                  
 36263 0000318B 57                      	push	di
 36264 0000318C 50                      	push	ax
 36265 0000318D 52                      	push	dx
 36266                                  
 36267 0000318E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36268 00003190 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36269 00003192 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36270 00003195 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36271 00003198 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36272                                  
 36273 0000319A 06                      	push	es
 36274 0000319B 56                      	push	si
 36275                                  
 36276 0000319C 0E                      	push	cs
 36277 0000319D 07                      	pop	es
 36278                                  
 36279 0000319E BF[BF34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36280 000031A1 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36281 000031A4 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36282                                  
 36283 000031A6 5E                      	pop	si
 36284 000031A7 07                      	pop	es
 36285 000031A8 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36286                                  
 36287 000031AA 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36288 000031AD 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36289 000031B0 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36290                                  
 36291 000031B2 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36292 000031B3 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36293 000031B5 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36294 000031B8 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36295 000031BB E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36296 000031BE 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36297                                  
 36298 000031C0 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36299 000031C2 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36300 000031C6 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36301                                  
 36302 000031C8 46                      	inc	si
 36303 000031C9 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36304 000031CA 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36305 000031CB 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36306 000031CC 5F                      	pop	di
 36307                                  
 36308                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36309 000031CD 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36310 000031D0 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36311                                  
 36312 000031D2 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36313 000031D5 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36314 000031D7 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36315 000031DA 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36316                                  
 36317                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36318 000031DC 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36319 000031DE 46                      	inc	si
 36320 000031DF 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36321 000031E0 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36322                                  
 36323 000031E2 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36324                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36325 000031E5 F9                      	stc
 36326 000031E6 C3                      	retn
 36327                                  
 36328                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36329 000031E7 5E                      	pop	si
 36330 000031E8 59                      	pop	cx
 36331 000031E9 5F                      	pop	di
 36332 000031EA EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36333                                  
 36334                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36335 000031EC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36336                                  
 36337                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36338 000031EF 2E8916[C734]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36339 000031F4 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36340 000031F7 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36341 000031FA B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36342 000031FD E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36343 00003200 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36344                                  
 36345 00003202 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36346 00003204 46                      	inc	si
 36347 00003205 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36348                                  
 36349                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36350 00003206 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36351 00003207 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36352 00003208 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36353                                  
 36354 00003209 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36355 0000320C E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36356 0000320F 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36357                                  
 36358 00003211 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36359 00003214 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36360 00003217 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36361 0000321A F9                      	stc
 36362 0000321B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36363 0000321D 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36364                                  
 36365 0000321F BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36366 00003222 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36367 00003225 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36368 00003227 F9                      	stc
 36369 00003228 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36370 0000322A 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36371                                  
 36372 0000322C 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36373 0000322E 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36374

 36376 00003233 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36377 00003236 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36378 00003239 F9                      	stc

 36380 0000323C 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36381

 36384 00003242 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36385 00003244 5E                      	pop	si

 36387 00003248 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36388 0000324B B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36389 0000324D F9                      	stc
 36390 0000324E CD21                    	int	21h
 36391 00003250 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36392                                  
 36393 00003252 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36394 00003254 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail

 36400 0000325F 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.

 36402 00003264 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 36409 0000326B 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry

 36411 0000326D 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36412                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36413 00003271 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36414                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36415

 36417                                  
 36418 00003276 50                      	push	ax

 36431 0000328A 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36432                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]

 36434                                  setdoscntry_data_next:

 36436 0000328F 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 36437 00003290 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 36438 00003291 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36439 00003293 46                      	inc	si
 36440 00003294 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36441 00003295 49                      	dec	cx
 36442 00003296 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36443 00003299 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36444 0000329B E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data

 36457 000032A2 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36458 000032A6 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so

 36478                                  getcountrydestination:
 36479                                  
 36480                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36481                                  ;input: al - data id
 36482                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36483                                  ;on return:
 36484                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36485                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36486                                  
 36487 000032B9 51                      	push	cx
 36488                                  	;add	di,74
 36489 000032BA 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36490                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36491 000032BD 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36492 000032C0 47                      	inc	di
 36493 000032C1 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36494

 36527                                  
 36528                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36529                                  
 36530                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36531                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36532                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36533                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36534                                  ;	 be moved.
 36535                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36536                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36537                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36538                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36539                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36540                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36541                                  
 36542 000032E7 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36543 000032E8 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36544 000032EB F9                      	stc
 36545 000032EC CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36546 000032EE 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36547 000032EF 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36548                                  
 36549 000032F1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36550 000032F3 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36551 000032F5 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36552 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36553 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36554                                  ricb_exit:
 36555 000032FA C3                      	retn

 36559                                  set_country_path:
 36560                                  
 36561                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36562                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36563                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36564                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36565                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36566                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36567                                  
 36568 000032FB 56                      	push	si
 36569                                  
 36570 000032FC 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36571 000032FD 06                      	push	es
 36572 000032FE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36573 000032FF 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 36574                                  
 36575 00003300 E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 36576 00003303 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 36577                                  
 36578 00003305 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36579 00003307 46                      	inc	si
 36580 00003308 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 36581 00003309 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 36582                                  
 36583                                  scp_default_drv:
 36584 0000330B B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36585 0000330D CD21                    	int	21h
 36586 0000330F 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36587                                  
 36588                                  scp_setdrv:
 36589 00003311 2EA2[7C34]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36590 00003315 BF[7F34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36591 00003318 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36592 0000331A 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36593 0000331C 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36594                                  
 36595 0000331E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36596 00003320 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36597                                  
 36598 00003322 EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36599                                  
 36600                                  scp_root_dir:
 36601 00003324 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36602                                  scp_path:
 36603 00003325 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36604                                  
 36605 00003328 BF[7C34]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36606                                  scpath_exit:
 36607                                  
 36608 0000332B 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36609 0000332C 06                      	push	es
 36610 0000332D 1F                      	pop	ds
 36611 0000332E 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36612                                  
 36613 0000332F 5E                      	pop	si
 36614 00003330 C3                      	retn

 36618                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36619                                  
 36620                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36621                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36622                                  ;carry set if not.
 36623                                  
 36624 00003331 50                      	push	ax

 36629 0000333A 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
